Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Concepción trabaja  como obrero de campo en un fundo agrícola de su ciudad, el trabaja todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana y puede hacerlo por un aproximado de 8 horas, el se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le va bien por su buen desempeño y responsabilidad.
Concepción se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar el mejoramiento de su vivienda, el desea poder techar la parte trasera de su vivienda, ya que se acercan las épocas de lluvia y quiere proteger a su familia, así pues él seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de terminar la construcción total de su vivienda.
texts.en:
Concepción is 36 years old and lives in the city of Ica. He has three children, who he loves and are his reason for living. He is a very friendly, hard working and enthusiastic person who dedicates all his energy to getting his family ahead. Unfortunately, due to a lack of resources, and because he needs to work, Concepción could not study for a professional career, but he would have liked to have done so. In his free time he likes to continue working and on occasion he makes a delicious dish of Chicharrones (a dish made from pork) to share with his family. 

On his own initiative and with a lot of tenacity and dedication, Concepción works as a field hand on an agricultural farm close to his city. He works every day from the early morning hours and continues to work for around 8 hours. He is glad to do his work and believes that everything is going well because of his performance and responsibility. 

Concepción is very appreciative of the loaners on Kiva because it is thanks to their help that he will be able to improve his home. He wants to be able to put a roof on the back part of the building because the rainy season is approaching and he wants to protect his family. To do this, he will continue working and striving to achieve his dream to finish the construction on his house.

loans.use: improve his home.

loans.name: Ybette

texts.es:
Ybette, de 44 años de edad, es una mujer trabajadora y empeñosa con muchos deseos de superación.  Está casada con Ramón quien es agricultor y padre de sus 03 hijos: Juliana de 22 años, Miguel de 18 años y Antonela de 06 años de  edad.  Vive en compañía de su esposo, sus 02 hijos y 01 nieto a los que quiere mucho, habitando en su propia casa que compro con la ayuda de su esposo. La actividad que realiza Ybette es la venta de abarrotes  de primera necesidad para lo cual cuenta con una bodega instalada en el interior de su propia casa, donde vende también frutas frescas, para esto se levanta muy de temprano y se dirige a los mercados donde compra las frutas más frescas de los productores y los lleva a su bodega para venderlos a sus clientes, que en su mayoría son sus propios vecinos. Se dedica a éste negocio desde hace 03 años, tiempo que viene atendiendo de manera amable y cordial a sus clientes ganándose sus preferencias y hasta el momento ésta actividad lo realiza sola.
Considera su negocio bastante rentable por la buena demanda que tiene sus productos y las ganancias que le deja.
Le gusta su negocio pues le permite estar en casa y cerca de sus hijos, así poder atenderlos, además de brindarle una ocupación  y generarle un ingreso económico para poder apoyar a su esposo con los gastos de su hogar y la educación de sus hijos. Viendo los buenos resultados que está teniendo con su actividad económica,  tiene planes de continuar  y hacer crecer, adquiriendo más mercaderías para surtir  su bodega. Por tanto éste será el préstamo número 03 con la institución MFP, se siente contenta de contar con un apoyo financiero para continuar con sus objetivos,  por lo cual  se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas, para tener un buen record crediticio y tener acceso a más créditos en el futuro. Por otro lado comenta sentirse a gusto con su banco comunal pues conoce a sus integrantes y los considera ser buenas personas.
Con el monto solicitado de 800 nuevos soles, lo invertirá en la compra de más mercaderías  para surtir su bodega, siendo abarrotes de primera necesidad como arroz, conservas, fideos y otros, a precio por mayor  para así tener mayores márgenes de ganancias.
texts.en:
Ybette, who is 44 years old, is a hardworking and earnest woman with a strong desire to get ahead in life. She is married to Ramon, who is a farmer and father to their three children: Juliana is 22 years old, Miguel is 18 years old, and Antonela is 6 years old. She lives together with her husband, two of her children, and one grandchild--all of whom she loves very much--in the home she purchased with the help of her husband. Ybette works selling staple grocery items from a storefront installed in their home. She sells fresh fruits by getting up early and heading to the local markets where she buys the freshest fruits from the vendors and brings them back to her store to sell to her customers, who for the most part are her own neighbors. She has been running her business for three years, during which time she has attended to her customers in a kind and cordial manner, thereby winning their business. At present, she runs this business all by herself.

She considers her business to be quite successful given the strong demand she has for her products and the income it brings her. She likes her business because it allows her to be at home, allows her to be around her children so she can care for them, and provides her with an occupation that generates an income. This allows her to help her husband with their home expenses and the education of their children. Seeing the good results she has had with her business, she has plans to continue and to expand, acquiring more merchandise to stock her store. Thus, she is applying for her third loan through the institution, MFP. She is grateful that she can count on the financial assistance to continue with her goals. She promises to make timely payments so that she can maintain a strong credit history and be able to secure more loans in the future. She also comments that she is happy with her communal bank; she knows the other members and considers them to be good people. 

With the amount of 800 nuevos soles requested, she will invest in more merchandise to stock her store: primary staples such as rice, canned goods, noodles, and other foodstuffs. She will purchase these wholesale so as to increase her profit margins.

loans.use: to purchase more goods to stock her store with staple items such as rice, canned goods, noodles, and other items.

loans.name: Candelaria Aida

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal Artesanal se reúne cada quince días en el Cantón Jipijapa, cantón conocido con el nombre de la sultana del café por los extensos cultivos de café el cual tiene un sabor incomparable, por su gastronomía y por la calidez de su gente. 

En este lugar vive la señora Candelaria, tiene 48 años de edad, está separada y de esta relación tienen cuatro hijos todos mayores de edad, dos de ellos aun viven con ella. Ella lleva dos años y medios en el Banco Comunal y le gusta por la ayuda que le han dado a pesar de no contar con el respaldo de un esposo.

Doña Candelaria es un ama de casa que para obtener sus propios recursos y con esto poder salir ella sola adelante sin depender de nadie se dedica a la venta de ropa de todo tipo, bisutería, vinchas y productos de Yanbal (productos de belleza, cosméticos, perfumería y accesorios para damas). Trabaja tres días a la semana de dos a tres horas diarias, deja sus productos a crédito y cobra cada ocho días. Cuando ella necesita más mercadería viaja hasta Guayaquil a proveerse de más productos.  Tiene 4 años que se dedica a esta actividad y le va muy bien.
	
Ella está repitiendo el crédito con la institución ya que es así como ella puede financiar su negocio el mismo que le da lo necesario para salir adelante, las ganancias que obtuvo le sirvieron para su alimentación, además de ciertos gastos médicos que tuvo ya que se enfermo. Este crédito es para comprar ropa, vinchas, perfumes, cremas, cosméticos entre otros productos. 

Su sueño es tener buena salud.
texts.en:
The "Artesanal" communal bank meets every two weeks in the canton of Jipijapa, the canton named "sultaness of coffee" for its extensive production of coffee (of incomparable quality), for its cuisine, and for its warm-hearted people. 

Candelaria lives in Jipijapa. She is 48 years old and is separated from her husband, with whom she has four adult children. Two of these children still live with her. Candelaria has belonged to this communal bank for two-and-a-half years. She enjoys the support it has given her even though she does not have the support of her husband. She is the head of her household. In order to provide for herself and get ahead without depending on anyone else, Candelaria began a retail business selling clothing, trinkets, headbands, and Yanbal products (beauty products, cosmetics, perfume, and women's accessories). 

She works three days a week for two or three hours daily. She allows her customers to buy her products on credit and collects payments weekly. When she needs to restock her store, Candelaria travels to Guayaquil to obtain her merchandise. She has been working in this business for four years, and it has gone very well for her.

Candelaria is requesting another loan through this institution so that she will be able to maintain her business and provide a living for herself as well as cover some medical expenses. She will use this loan to buy clothing, headbands, perfumes, creams, cosmetics, and other products. Her dream is to have good health.

loans.use: to buy clothing, headbands, perfumes, creams, cosmetics, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay insurance for her two school buses.

loans.name: Monica

texts.es:
Mónica es una mujer de 46 años, vive en la ciudad de Nazca con sus tres hijos, a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que dedica todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia, gracias a su esfuerzo y al apoyo de sus padre, Mónica pudo estudiar la carrera profesional de Educación, en sus ratos libres le gusta dedicar un poco de tiempo a la lectura y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Arroz con Pollo para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Mónica trabaja como profesora de nivel primario en un centro educativo de su ciudad, ella trabaja todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana y puede hacerlo por un aproximado de 8 horas, ella se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le va bien por su buen desempeño y dedicación.
Mónica se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de juguetes y adornos para el hogar, ya que al acercarse la época navideña, desea iniciar un pequeño negocio, así pues ella seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de tener una gran tienda comercial.
texts.en:
Mónica is a 46-year-old woman. She lives in the city of Nazca with her three children, whom she loves and who are her main motivation in life. She is a very kind person, hard-working and enthusiastic. She devotes all of her efforts to moving her family ahead. Thanks to her effort and the support of her parents, Mónica was able to study for a professional degree in education. In her free time, she likes to dedicate a bit of time to reading, and sometimes she makes delicious rice with chicken to share with her family.

On her own initiative, with a lot of determination and dedication, Mónica works as a primary school teacher at a teaching center in her city. She works every day from early in the morning, and she can do it for approximately 8 hours. She likes her work, and she believes it is going well for her due to her good performance and dedication. 

Mónica is very thankful to the Kiva lenders, since thanks to the help provided she will be able to buy toys and ornaments for the home, since Christmastime is coming. She wants to start a small business. She will continue working and striving to achieve her great dream of having a large store.

loans.use: to buy toys and ornaments to sell

loans.name: Fatima Carolina

texts.es:
Fátima es una mujer de 22 años, es soltera, vive en la ciudad de Ica con sus padres y hermanos, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación, gracias a su esfuerzo y al apoyo de sus padres, Fátima se encuentra estudiando la carrera profesional de Administración de Empresas, en sus ratos libres le gusta comer una deliciosa Pizza, ya que este es su comida favorita.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Fátima trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de ropa, tanto para damas, caballeros y niños, ella trabaja todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana y puede hacerlo por un aproximado de 8 horas, ella se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le va bien por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes.
Fátima se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias  a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de mayor cantidad de prendas de vestir, tales como polos, pantalones, camisas, blusas, etc., de esta manera Fátima tendrá su negocio mejor abastecido y podrá atender a mas clientes, así pues ella seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para convertirse en una buena profesional y lograr su gran sueño de tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
Fátima is a 22 year old singe woman. She lives in the city of Ica with her parents and siblings. She is a very friendly, hard-working, and enthusiastic person. She has a great desire for self-improvement, thanks to the efforts and support of her parents. Fátima is studying for a career in business administration. In her spare time she likes to eat delicious pizza, since that is her favorite food.

By her own initiative, with much effort and dedication, Fátima works in her own small business selling clothes for ladies, gentlemen, and children. She works every day, starting in the early morning and working for approximately 8 hours. She feels happy doing this work and believes that she is doing well due to the friendly treatment she provides her customers.

Fátima is grateful to the Kiva lenders, since thanks to the help provided, she will be able to buy a greater quantity of clothing, such as polos, pants, shirts, blouses, etc. This will mean Fátima's business will be better stocked and she will be able to serve more customers. She will continue working and striving to become a good professional and achieve her dream of having her own home.

loans.use: to buy clothing for sale.

loans.name: La Imaculada (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
El banco comunal la Inmaculada está formado por 6 socias y  1 socio quienes viven por una comunidad en Cuenca, lugar que goza de una gran vegetación natural y verdes campos de cultivos, su geografía accidentada nos regalan bellos paisajes, su gente son personas amables, gentiles y de un corazón muy cálido quienes con su trabajo diario salen adelante con sus familias, su orgullo es de aun mantener la cultura y tradiciones de sus padres.

Una de las socias de este grupo es la Señora. Carmen, tiene 28 años de edad, es madre soltera de una hija de 11 años que estudia en una escuelita de la localidad, no tiene casa propia por lo que vive en casa de sus padres con quienes comparte los gastos del hogar.
 
Doña Carmen se dedica a la crianza de cerdos, cuyes y pollos, también se dedica a la agricultura, siembra hortalizas y sus productos los vende en un mercado de la ciudad.
 
Su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compran de pollos y alimento para todos sus animales.
 
Sus metas son agrandar sus cultivos y llegar a tener su casa propia.

La foto pequeña es de una socia que no pudo estar presente cuando se tomo la foto del grupo.
texts.en:
The communal bank “La Inmaculada” is made up of six women and one man who live in a community in Cuenca, a place that enjoys a great deal of natural vegetation and green fields of crops.  Its rugged geography offers beautiful landscapes, it’s people are kind, gentle and warmhearted and who with their daily work manage to get ahead with their families.  Their pride is that they still maintain the culture and tradition of their parents.

One of the members of this group is Carmen.  She is 28 years old and is a single mother of an 11-year-old daughter that attends a small school in their town.  She doesn’t have her own house so she lives in the house of her parents with whom she shares the household expenses. 

Doña Carmen makes a living raising pigs, guinea pigs and chickens.  She is also engaged in agriculture, planting vegetables, and she sells her products in a market in the city.

She is going to invest her new loan in the purchase of chickens and feed for all of the animals.  Her goals are to increase her crops and to have her own house.

The small photo is of a member who couldn’t be present when the group photo was taken.

loans.use: to purchase chickens and animal feed.

loans.name: Anny Marcela

texts.es:
Anny es una joven de 25 años, de caracter muy algre y sobre odo con muchas ganas de salir adelante, ella vive en la ciaudad de Chincha, ciudad que se caracteriza por sus playas hermosas y por la alegria de sus pobladores. con mucho esfuerzo Anny logro estudiar la carrera de derecho, pero debido a que no encontraba empleo de acuerdo a su profesion, y luego de mucho buscar empleo logro ingresar a trabaja al municipio de su ciudad, ella trabaja alrededor de 8 horas al dia y ella cree que le va bien en su trabajo porque es muy responsable y sobre todo porque desea salir adelante.

Anny esta muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias  a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podra realizar mejoras en su vivienda ya que presenta algunas rajaduras y podra mejorar el techo ya que debido a que se acerca la temporada de lluvias evitara que su vivienda se inunde, asi ella seguira trabajando para poder hacer realidad su mas grande sueño:" Formar su propia empresa".
texts.en:
Anny is a young woman of 25. She has a very happy nature and above all a great will to advance. She lives in the city of Chincha, a city that is known for its beautiful beaches and for the happiness of its residents. With much effort, Anny managed to study for a career in law, but because she did not find employment appropriate to her profession, and after a great search for employment, she began work in the city municipality. She works about 8 hours a day, and she feels that her work is going well for her because she is very responsible and above all because she wants to advance.

Anny is very grateful to the Kiva lenders, since thanks to the help offered to her, she will be able to make improvements in her home, since there are some cracks, and she will be able to mend the roof. Since the rainy season is coming, she will avoid having her house be flooded. Thus she can continue working to make her greatest dream a reality: to form her own company.

loans.use: to improve her house

loans.name: Fredesvinda Elisa

texts.es:
Fredesvinda es una mujer de 55 años, vive en la ciudad de Nazca con sus cinco hijos, a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que dedica todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia, ya que ella siempre ha sido padre y madres para ellos; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad de trabajar desde muy joven, Fredesvinda no pudo culminar sus estudios primarios, pero le hubiera gustado mucho poder hacerlo, en sus ratos libres le gusta leer y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Seco de Res para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Fredesvinda trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de verduras, ella trabaja todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana y puede hacerlo por un aproximado de 10 horas, ella se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le va bien por su esfuerzo y por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes.
Fredesvinda se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de mayor cantidad de verduras, zapallo, queso y otros, de esta manera Fredesvinda tendrá su negocio mejor abastecido y podrá atender a mayor cantidad de clientes, así pues ella seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de ser una gran productora y comercializadora de verduras.
texts.en:
Fredesvinda is 55 years old and lives in the city of Nazca with her five children who she loves and are her reason for living. She is a very friendly, hard working and an enthusiastic person who dedicates all her energy to taking care of her family. She has always been both mother and father to her children. Unfortunately, due to a lack of resources and because she needed to work from a young age, Fredesvinda could not finish her primary school education, but she would like to have done so. In her free time she enjoys reading and on occasion she cooks a delicious Seco de Res (made from beef) that she shares with her family. 

On her own initiative and with a lot of tenacity and dedication, Fredesvinda works in her little store selling vegetables. She works every day from the early morning hours and works for up to 10 hours. She enjoys her work and believes that everything is going well for her because of her hard work and because of the friendly attention she gives her customers. 

Fredesvinda is very appreciative to the lenders at Kiva because the help that they give that will enable her to purchase a larger quantity of vegetables, pumpkin, cheese and other items. In this way, Fredesvinda will have a better stocked store and will be able to attend to a larger number of customers. In this way she will be able to continue working and striving to achieve her dream of being a large producer and selling vegetables.

loans.use: purchase vegetables for re-sale.

loans.name: Miguel Angel

texts.es:
Miguel e sun joven de 20 años de edad, vive en la ciudad de Chincha, la cual se caracteriza por tener un clima muy calido y acogedor, asimismo sus pobladores son personas muy alegres y sobre todo muy generosas y amables. Miguel vive al lado de sus padres a quienes quiere mucho y los apoya con los gastos del hogar. cuando tiene un tiempo libre a Miguel le gustaescuchar musica y en ocasiones le encanta comer uno de sus platillos favoritos el cual es el riquisimo "Arroz con Pato". Debiso a sus pocos recursos economicos Miguel solo pudo estudiar hasta el quinto grado de educacion secundaria, pero le hubiera gustado mucho estudiar la carrera de Administracion de empresas.

Cada dia Miguel se levanta muy temprano para poder acudir a su trabajo, ya que el labora como empleado en un fundo de alcachofas, el trabaja alrededor de 12 horas al dia y el cree que le va bien en su trabajo porque es responsable y sobre todo porque tiene muchas ganas de salir adelante.

Miguel esta muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias al gran apoyo que le han brindado el podra relizar mejoras en su vivienda como mejorar las paredes agrietadas y poder mejorar el techo de su vivienda ya que se acerca la temporada de lluvias; de esta manera podra brindarle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia y seguir luchando para ver hecho realidad su mas grande sueño:" Tener un negocio propio".
texts.en:
Miguel is a young man of 20. He lives in the city of Chincha, which is known for having a very warm and inviting climate. Similarly, its people are very happy and above all very generous and kind. Miguel lives with his parents, whom he loves very much and helps with the household expenses. When he has free time, Miguel likes to listen to music, and sometimes he likes to eat one of his favorite dishes, which is the very delicious rice with duck. Because of his few economic resources, Miguel was only able to study through the fifth year of secondary education, but he very much would have liked to study for a career in business administration.

Every day Miguel gets up very early to be able to arrive at work, since he works as an employee at an artichoke plantation. He works about 12 hours a day, and he believes that his work is going well for him because he is responsible and above all because he has a great will to advance.

Miguel is very grateful to the Kiva lenders, since thanks to the great help that they have offered him, he will be able to make improvements in his home, such as mending the cracked walls and being able to repair the roof of the house, since the rainy season is coming. In this way he will be able to offer a better quality of life to his family and continue working to see his greatest dream made a reality: to have his own business.

loans.use: to improve his house

loans.name: Israel Ivan

texts.es:
Israel es un hombre de 35 años, vive en la ciudad de Chincha con su pareja y sus dos pequeños hijos, a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, el es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que dedica todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia, gracias a su esfuerzo y al apoyo de sus padres, Israel pudo estudiar la carrera profesional de Agronomía, en sus ratos libres le gusta cocinar una riquísima Carapulcra para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Israel trabaja como técnico agropecuario en una empresa de su ciudad, adicionalmente los fines de semana trabaja como chofer de mototaxi, el trabaja todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana y puede hacerlo por un aproximado de 8 horas, el se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le va bien por su buen desempeño y por el trato amable que brinda a los demás.
Israel se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de un pequeño terreno, el cual en un futuro no muy lejano será su vivienda, así pues él seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de tener un puesto de venta de ropa en un gran centro comercial.
texts.en:
Israel is a 35 year old man. He lives in the city of Chincha with his spouse and his two young children, whom he loves and who are his main motivation in life. He is a very cheerful, hardworking, and enthusiastic person, who dedicates all his effort to getting his family ahead. 

Thanks to his efforts and the support of his parents, Israel was able to study for a professional career in Agriculture. In his free time, he enjoys cooking a delicious Carapulcra to share with his family. 

Through his own initiative and with much determination and dedication, Israel works as an agricultural expert in a business in his city. Additionally, on the weekends, he works as a mototaxi driver. 

He works every day from the early hours of the morning, and he can work for approximately 8 hours. He feels comfortable doing his work, and he believes it’s going well for him due to his good performance and the kind manner that he shows to others. 

Israel is very grateful to the Kiva lenders, since thanks to the help they have given, he will be able to purchase a small plot of land, which in the near future will be his home. Therefore, he will continue working and making an effort to achieve his greatest dream of having a clothing sales stand in a big business center.

loans.use: to purchase land.

loans.name: Unidas Para Alcanzar El Exito Group

texts.es:
¡Saludos desde Perú! Este es el  grupo Unidas para Alcanzar el Éxito

La Sra. María de 56 años es una de las socias del grupo. Ella trabaja brindando servicio de limpieza para la municipalidad de su distrito,  por otro lado también se dedica a la venta de algunos productos alimenticios como turrones y diferentes dulces, su trabajo le permite colaborar con los gastos familiares, más adelante le gustaría dedicarse solo a este trabajo, para eso buscara un lugar adecuado donde poner su negocio, el préstamo solicitado le será de gran utilidad para comprar sus dulces, de esa manera buscara abastecer a sus clientes quienes consumen los dulces que vende.
La Sra. María está muy agradecida por su préstamo, sobre todo a los Inversionistas KIVA que ayudan a toda su alcancia.
La Sra Maria viste ropa y gorra color verde.
texts.en:
Greetings from Perú!  This is the “Unidas para Alcanzar el Éxito” (United to Achieve Success) group.

María, 56 years old, is one of the members of the group.  She works providing a cleaning service for the municipality of her district.  On the other hand she also works selling food products like nougat and different sweets.  Her work allows her to contribute to the family expenses.  In the future she would like to dedicate herself solely to this work, for that she will look for a suitable place where she will set up her business.  

The requested loan will be very useful to her in purchasing her sweets.  In this way she will seek to supply her customers who consume the sweets that she sells.  María is very grateful for her loan, especially to the Kiva lenders that help her whole communal bank.

María is dressed in green clothes and a green cap.

loans.use: to purchase sweets.

loans.name: Daysy Ely

texts.es:
Daysy es estudiante de Obstetricia en un Instituto Superior
Daysy tiene 23 años, escogió la carrera de Obstetra para convalidarla con su otra profesión de enfermera la que ya culmino años atrás, en la actualidad trabaja en una clínica local y continua con sus estudios, cuando culmine sus estudios le gustaría  tener su propio consultorio donde pueda desarrollarse profesionalmente.
Daysy  ha solicitado  su préstamo para pagar las mensualidades de su Instituto y así culminar su carrera, aun cuando tiene el apoyo de sus padres la parte económica siempre es un obstáculo para jóvenes como ella , por eso esta agradecida a Instituciones como KIVA que apoyan  su deseo de progresar.
texts.en:
Daysy is a student of obstetrics at a higher institute. She is 23 years old. She chose the career of obstetrician to complement her other profession, nursing, which she finished some years ago. Now she works in a local clinic and continues with her studies. When she finishes her studies, she would like to have her own clinic, where she could continue to develop professionally.

Daysy has applied for her loan to make her monthly payments at her institute and thus finish her course of study. Even though she has the support of her parents, the economic part is always an obstacle for young women such as herself. For this reason, she is grateful to institutions such as Kiva, which support her desire to progress.

loans.use: to make her monthly payments

loans.name: Rosita Jazmin

texts.es:
Rosita es una joven de 20 años, la cual vive en la ciudad de Chincha, ciudad que s ecaracteriza por tener un clima muy calido y acogedor, asimismo se desarrolla la agricultura y tambien la pesca. Rosita es una joven con muchas ganas de salir adelante y a pesar de sus pocos recursos economicos ella dia a dia trabaja muy duro para poder salir adelante y sobre todo poder apoyar a sus padres y ser un orgullo para ellos.

Con mucho esfuerzo y entusiasmo Rosita trabaja como empleada en un almacen de su ciudad, ella labora alrededor de 9 horas al dia y ella cree que le va bien en su trabajo porque es muy responsable y honrada.

Rosita esta muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podra pagar los gastos de matricula y obtencion de documentos ya que acaba de ingresar a un instituto de su ciudad y es necesario el realizar la presentac ion de varios documentos, de esta manera ella podra iniciar su ciclo de estudios y asi seguir luchando para poder hacer realidad su mas grande sueño:" Tener una carrera profesional y ser un orgullo y ejemplo para sus padres".
texts.en:
Rosita is a young woman of 20. She lives in the city of Chincha, a city that is known for having a very warm and inviting climate, and where in addition  agriculture and also fishing are developing. Rosita is a young woman with a great will to advance, and in spite of her few economic resources, she works very hard every day to be able to advance and above all to be able to help her parents and make them proud of her.

With much effort and enthusiasm, Rosita works as an employee in a store in the city. She works about 9 hours a day, and she believes that her work is going well for her because she is very responsible and honest.

Rosita is very grateful to the Kiva lenders, since thanks to the help that they have offered her, she will be able to pay her matriculation expenses and obtain the necessary papers, since she has just entered an [educational] institute in her city, and she needs to present various documents. In this way she will be able to begin her course of studies and thus continue working to be able to make her greatest dream a realty: to have a professional career and to be a source of pride and a model for her parents.

loans.use: to pay for registration fees and documents.

loans.name: Eladia Marisela

texts.es:
Doña Eladia , 36 años de edad, es originaria de Boaco, casada, madre de 2 hijos de 12 y 16 años de edad, actualmente están estudiando, de oficio comerciante, se dedica al negocio de una mini pulpería. Inicio en el ámbito del comercio a la edad de 30 años, vendiendo ropa usada de forma ambulante, luego con ahorros que tenía,  decidió emprender  otro negocio de mini pulpería, ya que con esfuerzo propio ha podido reforzar sus ventas invirtiendo en productos básicos para el negocio, del que es propietario hace 3 años, ella cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo quien le ayuda con la administración de la pulpería, en tiempos que esta libre el sale a vender su ropa usada a las comarcas mas cercanas de la comunidad
Su expectativa es crecer más  en mercadería para su negocio  con el objetivo de aumentar sus ventas. Requiere el préstamo para la compra de productos como snacks,  leche, pasta dental, papel higiénico, arroz, jabón, azúcar, etc. El estima que este crédito le ayudara porque podrá surtir su pulpería con productos mas solicitados por los clientes, sus planes futuros es ampliar el área del local, su  meta es seguir trabajando en su negocio, obtener mas ganancias, cancelar el préstamo para solicitar otro  y poder salir adelante con su familia.
texts.en:
Eladia, who is 36 years old, is originally from Boaco. She is married and has two children, aged 12 and 16 years old, who are currently studying. She is a businesswoman and has a small store. 

She started in the business when she was 30 years old, selling used clothes as a street peddler. Later, with the savings she had, she decided to launch another business: her small store. With effort, she has been able to strengthen her sales by investing in basic products for the business she had for three years. She has the support of her husband who helps with the administration of the store. When she has some spare time, she goes to sell used clothes to the closest regions to the community.

Her expectation is to have more merchandise for her business in order to increase sales. She needs a loan to buy products such as snacks, milk, toothpaste, toilet paper, rice, soap, sugar, etc. She estimates that this loan will help because she will be able to stock the store with the most requested products by customers. Her future plans are to expand her premises. Her goal is continue working in the business, make more profits, pay off the loan to request another one and get ahead with her family.

loans.use: to buy products such as snacks, milk, toothpaste, toilet paper, rice, soap, sugar, etc.

loans.name: María José

texts.es:
Doña maria, es una comerciante de cal y sal, productos de los cuales los comercializa en el norte de Nicaragua a productores de café, hortalizas, ferreterías y ganaderos de la zona.
Su negocio lo inicia con el apoyo financiero de su padre, quien también por muchos años se dedica e esta actividad comercial.
Sin embargo para poder atender la demanda de cal y sal, necesita un préstamo para brindar una mejor rapidez en la entrega de estos productos.
Su estado civil es acompañado, y cuenta con la colaboración de su pareja para atender esta actividad comercial, tiene un hijo en edad de preescolar y con los ingresos que obtiene es para solventar los gastos del hogar.
texts.en:
María sells lime and salt in the north of Nicaragua to coffee and vegetable producers, hardware stores, and ranchers in the area.  She started her business with financial support from her father, who also has made a living in this business for many years.

Nevertheless, she needs a loan to be able to handle the demand for lime and salt, so she can deliver these products more quickly.

She has a common-law spouse, who helps her attend to this business.  She has a preschool-age child and her income is to pay for the household expenses.

loans.use: to buy lime and salt

loans.name: Teofila Marina

texts.es:
Teofila e suna mujer de 48 años de edad, pero con un carisma y alegria de una joven de 20. Su vivienda se ubica en la ciudad de Nazca, en la provincia de vista alegre, la cual se caracteriza por desarrollarse la mineria y la agricultura. Teofila es muy trabajadora y desde muy joven aprendio a ganars eel pan con el sudor de la frente ya que apoyaba a sus padres con los gastos del hogar. Debido a sus pocos recursos economicos ella solo pudo estudiar hasta el quinto grado de secundaria, pero le hubiera gustado tener uan carrera universitaria.

Día a día Teofila trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de abarrotes, bebidas gaseosas y cervezas en un espacio que ella ha habilitado en su humilde vivienda, ella trabaja alrededor de 9 horas al dia y puede atender hasta 15 clientes diariamente; ella cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es amable y respetuosa con los clientes y sobre todo porque tiene muchas ganas de mejorar cada dia.

Teofila esta muy agradecida con el apoyo que le han brindado los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la aydua que le han brindado ella podra comprar mercaderia para su engocio como gaseosas al por mayor y cervezas, de esta mabera su negocio tendra lo necesario para seguiir creciendo y podra mejorar sus ingresos; asi ella seguira luchando cada dia para poder hacer realidad su mas grande sueño:" Tener su casa propia".
texts.en:
Teofila is a 48-year-old woman, but with the charisma and happiness of a 20-year-old.  Her home is located in the city of Nazca, in the province of Vista Alegre, known for mining and agriculture.  Teofila's very hardworking and learned to earn a living with the sweat of her brow at a very young age because she helped her parents with the household expenses.  Because of her limited economic resources she only was able to study to the fifth year of secondary school, but she would like to have studied in the university.

Every day Teofila works in her small business selling groceries, soda, and beer in a space she has set up in her modest home.  She works around nine hours a day and can serve up to 15 customers a day.  She believes it's going well for her in her business because she's friendly and respectful with the customers and especially because she very much wants to improve every day.

Teofila's very grateful for the support from the Kiva lenders because thanks to their help she'll be able to buy merchandise for her business such as soda wholesale and beer.

This way her business will have what it needs to continue growing and she'll be able to improve her income.  She'll continue striving every day to be able to make her biggest dream come true: "To have her own house."

loans.use: to buy soda and beer

loans.name: Marwa

texts.en:
Marwa, a 25-year-old conservative woman, has asked her husband to take her place in the photo.

Marwa cares for their three children in their rented house and her husband works at a full-time job during the day. After work he sells used and new mobile phones from their home. Marwa helps her husband while he is at work by selling to those who are looking for a new mobile phone. 

They said, “This business, although it is still small,  is helping us to pay for our kids’ school fees as we chose a high level of education private schools to enroll our kids in so they can get the best education.”

They hope for their business to grow, as it brings in more income than their monthly salary. Marwa has decided to take another youth loan to increase the number of mobile phones they have, whether its new or used ones, to increase the monthly profits and move a step closer to achieve their goal.

loans.use: to buy more mobile phones to sell.

loans.name: Yazan

texts.en: Yazan is a 31-year-old man married to a working wife. They have no children. For five years, Yazan has been running his own small restaurant where he makes take-away sandwiches and local appetizer plates. Yazan wants to improve his business by adding new types of sandwiches that are not currently available at his restaurant. Using the loan money, Yazan will buy more ingredients and food products for making these new sandwiches.

loans.use: to buy food to diversify his restaurant.

loans.name: Hamda

texts.en: Hamda is a 47-year-old married woman and a mother to eight sons and daughters. Her husband is an electronics technician. Not knowing how to read and write has limited her options of getting a job that pays a good salary. To help support their big family, she has opened her own small food store in the neighborhood where she sells food products and other goods. She has applied for this loan to increase the amount of food products in her store and add variety to it.

loans.use: to buy more food products to sell in her store.

loans.name: Ayat

texts.en: Ayat, a 26-year-old married woman, is a mother to three girls. She is supporting her family with the help of her husband by selling clothes from their home. She gets the clothes from other cheaper markets or the free zone areas and sells them to friends, neighbors and others. Ayat has applied for a youth loan to take advantage of the sale season and get new winter clothing items to sell.

loans.use: to buy new winter clothing items to sell.

loans.name: Sameer

texts.en: Sameer is a 62-year-old man, living with his wife and son. Sameer has a makeup and perfume sales business. With this business, Sameer is making an income to support his family and keep himself busy at this age rather than sitting at home doing nothing. Now Sameer is applying for a loan to bring in more perfumes and cosmetic products to sell.

loans.use: to bring in more perfumes and cosmetic products to sell.

loans.name: Zamzam

texts.en: Zamzam is a 43-year-old married woman. Her husband works in a restaurant. Zamzam has a small home business making embroidered dresses by order. Her previous loan was used to buy thread for her business. Now she is applying for another loan to make more embroidered dresses to sell in local bazaars and increase her productivity in addition to making dresses to order. She will buy more fabric or plain dresses and add her embroidery art to them.

loans.use: to buy fabric for her embroidered dress designs.

loans.name: Abdulrahman

texts.en: AbdulRahman is an 18-year-old single man with two older brothers. AbdulRahman is a new student attending a governmental university to study electrical engineering. He has applied for this educational loan to help him pay his fees for next semester.

loans.use: to pay his fees for the next semester at his university.

loans.name: Mervat

texts.en: Mervat is a 24-year-old married woman and mother to two girls and one boy. Her husband is a member of the military. To help support her family, Mervat sells food and home products and appliances. She has applied for a youth loan to buy more basic food products that were requested by her customers. She wants to buy them in large quantities to save money.

loans.use: to buy more basic food products to sell.

loans.name: Tuqa

texts.en: Tuqa is an 18-year-old single woman living with her parents, three brothers and a sister. Tuqa is in her first year at the university studying to become a teacher. She applied for this loan to pay her fees so she can register for next semester.

loans.use: to pay her fees for next semester at her the university.

loans.name: Emad

texts.en: Emad, a 19-year-old single man, is the youngest son in his family of two sisters and a brother. Emad works in a clothing store and contributes his income to his parents to help pay his school fees. Emad is a university student majoring in accounting and is in his second year now. He applied for this loan to help pay his fees for next semester.

loans.use: to pay his university fees for next semester.

loans.name: Shahd

texts.en: Shahd, an 18-year-old woman, is the only daughter in a family with six sons. Their father works in the ministry of health. Shahd is a first year student in the university majoring in geology. She applied to this loan to pay for her fees for next semester  and continue on her path of education.

loans.use: to pay her fees for next semester at the university.

loans.name: Wakakooma Group

texts.fr:
Mme AMINATA est responsable du groupe  WAKAKOOMA. Mariée, elle est mère d‘un enfant. Il à 06ans et  va  à l’école. Mme a 02 personnes  en charge.
Mme vend du bois de chauffe et charbon depuis 03ans.  Elle s’approvisionne par livraison  à domicile pour le bois et chez les grossistes du quartier pour le charbon. Ses clients sont les hommes et femmes.
Elle veut s’acheter 06 sacs de charbon.
Elle  veut  renforcer son activité avec ses bénéfices. Mme  ambitionne agrandir son commerce et aider son mari pour les charges de la famille.
texts.en:
Mrs. Aminata is in charge of the Wakakooma group. She is married and the mother of a 6 year old who goes to school. She has two dependents. 

She has been selling firewood and charcoal for 3 years. She gets home delivery of the firewood and buys her charcoal from local wholesalers. Her clients are both men and women. 

She would like to buy six bags of charcoal. She would like to bolster her business with her profits. She would like to grow her business and help her husband with the household expenses.

loans.use: to buy six bags of charcoal.

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en: Mohammad is a single, 23-year-old man. He is talented when it comes to making mosaic art work, so he chose it as a profession. Now Mohammad has applied for a loan so he can buy more frames and mosaic stones to make more artwork.

loans.use: to buy more frames and mosaic stones for his artwork.

loans.name: Rima

texts.en: Rima is a 34-year-old married woman. Rima and her husband are supporting a family of 6 members with their work in farming. Her husband works during the day in other people’s farms while Rima is taking care of their own small nursery. Rima is now applying for a loan to buy fertilizers to strengthen their plants.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers to strengthen their plants.

loans.name: Aisha

texts.en:
Aisha is a 48-year-old married woman.  She looks after her one son and one daughter. Her husband works in a printing house and Aisha still has her spices packing business but she also started to concentrate on working with her husband in the printing business. Her husband does the printing part and then brings the printed items back to their home and Aisha works on finishing, packing and completing the orders.
Aisha has applied for this loan to buy more glue, bags and other needed material for the finishing until they can buy the required machine to do the finishing work.  She hopes that she can open her own printing house in the future.

loans.use: to buy more glue, bags and other materials for their printing business.

loans.name: Zain

texts.en:
Zain is a 36-years-old married lady. She lives with her husband and 4 children in a rental home. 

Zain is employed and has a second job of selling clothes, blankets and ladies handbags at home to help support the family. She has applied for this loan in order to increase the quantity of winter items she has to offer.

loans.use: to increase her winter collection inventory.

loans.name: Randa

texts.en:
Randa is a 25-years-old married lady. She has a boy and a girl. Her husband is a public sector employee.

Randa has a beauty salon business for hair dressing and make up. Randa has applied for a youth loan to purchase more make up products because most of her customers are brides.

loans.use: to purhase more make up products.

loans.name: Grace

texts.en:
Grace is a 27-years-old mother of two from northern Israel. After graduating from high school, Grace earned a degree in environmental science and tried working within her field. Unfortunately in the region where Grace lives, her degree and experience were not in high demand. Positions open to her were only part time and not with sufficient salaries. Grace refused to give up and knew she could develop a strong income, while using her intelligence and professionalism. 

Grace decided to earn her hair styling certification and opened a small salon in her home. After proving she could gain clients, provide top notch services, and develop her business activity, Grace found a central location to open her salon in her town. 

Grace needs this loan to assist with furnishing, and purchasing supplies for, her salon such as a sink and chair for a hair washing station, a cart, professional scissors and brushes, mirrors, countertops and a supply closet.

Grace wants to see her salon expand so she can earn a respectable living and grow as a businesswoman

loans.use: to furnish and purchase supplies for her salon.

loans.name: Manal

texts.en: Manal is a 45-years-old widow who is supporting her two sons and daughter by performing tailoring work at home. So far all she does is sew the clothes that people bring to her but she wants to start making her own clothes for sale. She applied for this loan to buy more threads and fabrics.

loans.use: to buy more threads and fabrics.

loans.name: Rim

texts.en:
Rim is a young mother from Israel’s Negev region. After finishing high school she began studying at the Engineering and Physics College. When she became pregnant, Rim decided she was unable to dedicate the time needed to her studies and began looking for other options that allowed her to raise her child and continue to move forward. Rim opened a small clothing store at her local mall that caters to  the entire family. She has already seen success. Over the last year she has grown and gained a good client base.

Rim needs this loan to acquire inventory and expand her merchandise selections.

Rim is an intelligent and determined young women who knows she can create a strong life for herself and her family. She is dedicated to seeing her business succeed and is planning on opening another branch of her store in a nearby town. Rim is on the path to growth and is taking each step in a well planned and prepared manner.

loans.use: to acquire new inventory and expand her merchandise selections.

loans.name: Terese

texts.en:
Terese utilized her first loan to branch out into providing arrangements for special events. In her business, Therese works to diversify her products and client base to stay competitive. She has not fully utilized online marketing. She wants to branch out in this area so she is not reliant only on customers who come into her store.

She needed this loan for cash flow after a difficult period during the war to make small renovations and to upgrade her website for an expanded clientele base. Terese continues to provide a decent living for herself and her family. She wants to continue to keep her business strong and keep her family's financial situation healthy.

loans.use: to make small renovations and to upgrade her website.

loans.name: Dana

texts.en: Dana is a 32-year-old married lady. She has no kids of her own but her husband has 6 sons and daughters from a previous marriage. To help her husband support their family Dana started a business of herding animals with her husband. Now she has applied for this loan to buy some food for the animals and to start working on getting the milk to start a cheese and yogurt making business.

loans.use: to buy some food for the animals.

loans.name: Alejandro Isaía

texts.es:
El Sr. Alejandro es comerciante de agua purificada y de gas, negocio que tiene siete años de estar funcionando. 
El inicia su actividad comercial con la ayuda económica de su madre, quien le da la idea de distribuir agua purificada y gas al mercado municipal y diferentes puntos de ventas de la ciudad.
Antes de tener su microempresa era conductor de bus inter-local. En donde obtenía ingresos para mantener a su familia.
Con su nuevo negocio ha mejorado las condiciones de vida de su familia, mejorando su hogar y el bienestar de sus hijos.
En estos momentos necesita financiamiento para comprar diferentes presentaciones de agua purificada, esto con el objetivo de diversificar su negocio y atender las necesidades de sus clientes.
texts.en:
Alejandro has been selling purified water and gas for seven years. He started the business with financial aid from his mother, who gave him the idea of selling purified water and gas at the city market and at various outlets in the city. Before having this micro business, he drove a local bus to earn income to support his family.

His new business has helped him to improve his family's situation and his children's well being and to repair his house. He now needs financing to buy different purified water displays to diversify his business and service his customers.

loans.use: to buy purified water and gas.

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en: Ahmad is a 22-year-old single guy who has one sister and two brothers. He is a university student majoring in Accounting. He has applied for this loan to register and pay for the next semester so he can eventually get his BA degree.

loans.use: pay for the next semester.

loans.name: Walaa

texts.en:
Walaa is a 22-year-old conservative single lady, so she asked her brother to appear in the photo instead.

Walaa has one sister and three brothers. She goes to the university to study foreign languages. After graduation she wants to look for a job where she can apply what she studied. She has applied for this loan to be able to pay her upcoming semester fees.

loans.use: to pay her upcoming semester fees.

loans.name: Ghadeer

texts.en: Ghadeer is a 20-year-old university student majoring in Computer Information Systems. She is one of 6 siblings living together. She has applied for this loan to pay her upcoming semester fees at the university.

loans.use: to pay her upcoming semester fees.

loans.name: Motasem

texts.en: Motasem is a 21-year-old guy who works and studies at the same time to support himself, as he is one of 7 siblings in the family. He works in a shoe store and is studying at the university to become a teacher. Lately Motasem faced a financial shortage for urgent reasons, and because of that he has applied for this loan to pay his next semester fees.

loans.use: to pay his next semester fees.

loans.name: Nilson

texts.es:
Nilson tiene 30años, vive al lado de su pareja y producto de su amor tienen un hijo de 2 años de edad, a cual quiere y ama mucho y por quien trabaja con muchas ganas para poder brindarle una vida digna y sobre todo con mucho amor. cuando tiene un tiempo libre a Nilson le gusta mucho pasear con su pequeño y sobre todo disfrutar de uno de sus platillos favoritos el cual es el riquisimo Arroz Chaufa. 

Con mucho esfuerzo y dedicacion Nilson trabaja en su negocio como albañil, el trabaja alrededor de 9 horas al dia y en algunas ocasione spuede trabajar mas tiempo ya que depende mucho del tamaño de la construccion que realice, asimismo cuando no tiene construcciones por realizar el trabaja como chofer de mottaxi, con el fin de no dejar de llevar el sustento para su familia; el cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es responsable y sobre todo desea darle a su familia una vida mejor y por ello se esfuerza para lograrlo.

Nilson esta muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podra mejorar su vivienda contruyendo un pequeño cuarto para su pequeño y tambien refaccionar las paredes de su vivienda que se encuentran agrietadas debido a ls continuos sismos, de esta manera el podra mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia y seguira luchando por hacer realidad su mas grande sueño:" Tener su casa propia de material noble y darle una buena educacion a su hijo".
texts.en:
Nilson, 30, lives with his partner and their two-year-old son, whom he loves very much and for whom he works hard to so that he can have a dignified life full of love. In his free time, Nilson really enjoys taking his son for a walk or eating one of his favorite local dishes, a delicious fried rice with vegetables.

Nilson works diligently as a bricklayer for nine hours each day. His hours may be longer and depend on the size of the project. When there is no construction work available, he drives a motor taxi to support for his family. He says things are going well because he is responsible and because he strives to give his family the better life he wishes for them.


Nilson thanks the Kiva lenders whose help will allow him to improve his house. He will build a small room and repair cracks in walls damaged by regular earthquakes. This will make his family's living conditions better and let him keep striving to achieve his dream: "to have his own well-built home and give his son a good education."

loans.use: to make improvements to his house.

loans.name: Nancy

texts.es: La Señora Nancy  tiene 28 tiene un hijo de la edad de 5 años, ella se dedica a la venta de variedad de edredones, sabanas y frazadas en su tienda que se encuentra en la comunidad de Huayrocondo de la ciudad de El Alto,  este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución,  La Señora Nancy  va a usar este préstamo para la compra de variedad de edredones por mayor ya que  esta época tiene mucha demanda y ella desea surtir su negocio, su razón para solicitar este préstamo es que le hicieron algunos pedidos y no contaba con el capital necesario para de sus productos, La Señora Nancy  enfrenta retos en su negocio que son la competencia y la alta demanda por la época y va a utilizar los beneficios en aumentar su mercadería y por ende sus ventas.
texts.en: Nancy is 28 and has a five-year-old son. She sells a variety of comforters, sheets, and blankets in her shop located in the Huayrocondo neighborhood in the city of El Alto. This will be her first loan cycle with the institution. Nancy will use the loan to buy a variety of wholesale comforters to stock her shop during this busy season. She is applying for the loan because she lacks working capital to fill orders for these items. Nancy faces stiff competition and high seasonal demand, so she wants to expand her inventory to increase sales.

loans.use: to buy comforters.

loans.name: José Ernesto

texts.es:
El Sr. José Ernesto es comerciante, también presta el servicio de reparación de bicicleta, su actividad comercial es venta de repuestos y accesorios para bicicleta, tiene un tramo en el costado oeste del mercado municipal, le ayuda a realizar las reparaciones y atender a sus clientes un hermano que pasa todo el día con él en el tramo. La compra de los repuestos los realiza una vez al mes en el mercado de la capital.
El sr. Ernesto necesita un financiamiento para invertirlo en su negocio compra de mercadería para así obtener mayor utilidades y poder sufragar los gastos de su hogar.
Es casado, tiene dos hijos menores de edad en edad escolar.
Tiene casa propia gracias a los financiamiento que se le han otorgado y ha ido invirtiéndolos en su casa. Se siente muy bien trabajar con nosotros ya que le han servido muchísimo los créditos que se le han financiado.
Es una persona humilde y luchadora para su bienestar y el de su familia.
texts.en:
José Ernesto is a merchant and also repairs bicycles. He sells bicycle parts and accessories from his shop on the west side of the local market. His brother helps him do repairs and wait on customers in the shop all day. He buys the parts once a month in the market in the capital. 

Ernesto needs financing to buy inventory and invest in his business to earn better profits and be able to meet household expenses. He is married and the father of two school-age, minor children. Thanks to a loan, he owns his house and is investing in it. He likes working with the institution because the loans have been very helpful. He is modest and works hard for his family's well being.

loans.use: to buy bicycle parts such as tires, frames, chain, rims, and bearings.

loans.name: Cándida

texts.es:
La Sra. Cándida es comerciante tiene una pequeña pulpería en su casa de habitación, tiene siete años de tener este negocio, sus compras las realiza en el mercado municipal algunas otras se las llevan los proveedores al negocio, es una señora mayor pero  con ganas de trabajar y de luchar por la vida, se siente muy bien trabajando y tener su propio negocio.
Es casada, tiene su propia casa, tiene tres hijos ya mayores trabajan y  le ayudan económicamente.
La Sra. Cándida necesita un financiamiento para invertirlo en su negocio en la compra de granos básicos y productos lácteos que es lo que más consumen sus clientes.
Me siento contenta por todos los financiamientos que me han brindado. Espero me sigan apoyando.
texts.en:
Cándida is a merchant and has had a small store in her house for seven years. She buys some inventory in the city market, and suppliers deliver other items. She is a mature woman who wants to work and strive, and she likes working and having her own business. She is married, has her own home, and has three adult children who work and help her out financially.

Cándida needs a loan to invest in her business and buy the grains and milk products her customers purchase frequently. She is pleased with the loans she has received and hopes to continue receiving support.

loans.use: to buy grains such as rice, sugar, milk products, milk, and candies.

loans.name: Walter Martin

texts.es:
El Sr. Walter presta el servicio de soldador y al mismo tiempo es mecánico tiene su propio taller, tiene bastante clientela que llegan con sus vehículo para que él se los repare, trabajan cuatro personas en el taller realizando diferentes trabajos.
Este cliente necesita un financiamiento para comprar un soldador que es una de las herramientas principal en su trabajo ya que por la demanda que tiene no le da abasto el soldador que tienen.
Ya me han financiado algunos crédito y me siento satisfecho y contendo por la oportunidad que me han brindado y la confianza que depositaron en mi. Estos créditos me han ayudado en el crecimiento de mi negocio. Espero me sigan apoyando.

Es casado, tiene tres hijos dos en edad escolar.
texts.en:
Walter provides a welding service and also has his own mechanical workshop. He has lots of customers that bring their vehicles to him to repair. There are four people in the workshop who do different jobs.

This borrower needs a loan in order to buy a soldering iron which is one of the main tools in his work and because of the demand the soldering iron he has isn’t able to accommodate the need.

Walter says, “I am happy and content for the loans provided and for the opportunity and confidence placed in me. These loans have helped me to expand my business. I hope you continue to help me.”

He is married and has two school age children.

loans.use: to buy a soldering iron to use in his workshop.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy merchandise to stock her store with various items.

loans.name: Tomas Alberto

texts.es:
El Sr. Tomas es profesor de educación secundaria tiene veinte y cuatro años de laborar, es casado tienen dos hijos mayores de edad, su esposa también es profesora de educación primaria.
Don Tomas tiene casa propia, pero necesita un financiamiento para hacer un aumento al frente de su casa de habitación un porche porque está abierto y es peligroso. Para esto necesita comprar materiales de construcción como piedras, arena, hierro y cemento.
Este cliente se siente muy bien  por todo el apoyo que se le ha brindado con los financiamientos anteriores que se les ha otorgado que solo así ha podido tener su propia casa ya que solo con su salario se les hace difícil por lo que es poco los que ganan.
texts.en: Tomas is a secondary school teacher and has been working for twenty-four years. He is married and has two adult sons. His spouse is a primary school teacher. They have a house of their own, but Tomas needs money to build a porch at the front, since at the moment there is nothing and that is dangerous. To build this, he needs supplies such as stones, sand, iron, and cement. Tomas is very grateful for the previous loans he was granted, which helped him tremendously. It is thanks to them that he was able to have a house of his own, which would have been impossible with just his and his wife's salaries.

loans.use: to buy construction materials.

loans.name: Mario Heber

texts.es:
Mario es un hombre de 44 años, vive en la ciudad de Ica con su esposa y sus hijas, a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, el es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que dedica todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia, en sus ratos libres le gusta compartir gratos momentos con su familia y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Arroz Chaufa para engreírlas.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Mario trabaja como maestro constructor, el trabaja todos los días desde tempranas horas  de la mañana y puede hacerlo por un aproximado de 10 horas, el se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le va bien por sus buenos acabados y por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes.
Mario se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de una laptop,  la cual servirá de mucho para sus hijas, quienes se encuentran estudiando, así pues él desea apoyarlas con esta herramienta para que realizar sus trabajos y mejoren sus métodos de estudio, de esta manera el seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para terminar la construcción de su vivienda y lograr su gran sueño de ver a sus hijas convertidas en buenas profesionales.
texts.en:
Mario is 44 years old. He lives in the city of Ica with his wife and daughters, whom he loves and they are the main reason for living. He is a very friendly person, hardworking and enthusiastic, and he devotes all his efforts towards providing for his family. In his free time he likes to share pleasant times with his family and sometimes he cooks the delicious Arroz Chaufa (fried rice with chicken) to spoil them.

On his own initiative, through much effort and dedication, Mario works as a master builder. He works every day from early morning hours for approximately 10 hours, being happy in his work and he believes that it is going well because of his finished product and the friendly treatment he gives his customers.

Mario is grateful to Kiva lenders, and thanks to their assistance he will be able to buy a laptop, for his daughters to use, who are students. He wants to help them with this tool so they can do their work and have better methods to study. He continues working and putting his efforts towards finishing the construction of his home and towards achieving his big dream of seeing his daughters become good professionals.

loans.use: to buy a laptop for his daughters to use in their school work

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to stock the family business with fruit, vegetables, and products it needs.

loans.name: María Luisa

texts.es:
Doña María Luisa se dedica a confeccionar todo tipo de prendas de vestir así como uniformes escolares y de empresas que brindan diversos servicios en la zona de san Rafael del sur. 
Lleva más de treinta años ejerciendo dicha actividad lo cual le ha permitido tener una buena demanda de clientela que llegan en busca de sus servicios de costura, el esposo también es de oficio costurero ambos se ayudan en la solución de sus clientes. 
Es importante mencionar que de su actividad han logrado mejorar las condiciones de vida y que sus hijos logren sus metas. Por lo que agradece a organismo que ofertan ese tipo de servicio para con persona de escasos recursos económico.
texts.en:
María Luisa works making every type of clothing, such as school uniforms and uniforms for businesses that offer different services in the area of southern San Rafael. 

She has more than thirty years experience doing this activity, which has allowed her to have a good demand from her customers who seek out her sewing services. Her husband also works sewing and they both help each other serving the customers.  

It is important to mention that with this activity she has been able to improve her quality of life and help her children achieve their goals. That is why she is grateful to this organization for this type of service for people of low resources.

loans.use: to buy fabric, thread and other accessories for her activity.

loans.name: Angelica Esperanza

texts.es:
Angelica tien 21 años de edad es una joven con muchas ganas de salir adelante y sobre todo sacar adelante a su hijo de tan solo 2 años de edad, ya que ella es madre soltera y con mucho amor y sobre todo esfuerzo dia a dia trabaja muy duro para poder brindarle una vida digna a su pequeño. Angelica cada dia se levanta muy temprano ya que ella tiene su negocio de venta de ropa, ella trabaja alrededor de 9 horas al dia y lleva en su negocio alrededor de 2 años; ella cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es amable con los clientes y porque ofrece productos de calidad a precios comodos.

Angelica esta muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podra comprar 2 vitrinas para exhibir sus productos y comprar ropa de verano como short, faldas, bividis, ropas de baño, entre otros, de esta manera ella podra mostrar mejor sus productos y poder tener mayor variedad y asi mejorar sus ingresos y seguira luchando por hacer realidad su mas grande sueño:" Darle una profesion a su hijo y poder tener una gran tienda de ropa".
texts.en:
Angelica is 21 years old. She is a young woman who is eager to get ahead and above all to help her two-year-old son succeed. She is a single mother and works very hard with great love and effort to be able to provide a decent life for her little one.

Angelica gets up very early every day because she has a business selling clothing. She works about nine hours a day and has run her business for approximately two years. She believes it is going well because she is friendly with her customers and because she offers high quality products at good prices.

Angelica is very grateful to Kiva lenders because, thanks to their help, she will be able to purchase two glass cabinets to display her merchandise along with summer clothing, such as shorts, skirts, men's underwear (bvds) and bathing suits, among other items. In this way she will be able to show her merchandise better, offer greater variety and thus improve her earnings. This will allow her to continue struggling to make her greatest dreams a reality: that her son will become a professional and that she will own a large clothing store one day..

loans.use: to purchase glass cabinets and merchandise.

loans.name: Armando Fredy

texts.es:
Armando es un joven muy trabajador, vive en la ciudad de Carhuaz, ubicada en la sierra peruana con temperaturas comprendidas entre 11 y 21 °C, esta ciudad tambien se caracteriza por poseer uno de sus atractivos turisticos mas visitados el cual es el Nevado de Pastoruri, asimismo podemos apreciar los danzantes de "Shaqsha". Armando vive al lado de su esposa y nfruto de su amor tiene un pequeño hijo por el cual Armando daria la vida ya que lo ama mucho y por ello se esfuerza para poder bridarle una vida digan y sobre todo convertirlo en una persona d ebien. Armando   es un joven con muchas ganas de salir adelante y es por ello que cada dia sale a trabajar como chofer de taxi, ya que con el fruto de su trabajao solventa ls gastos de su hogar; el cree que le va bien en su trabajo porque es muy amable con los clientes y sobre todo porque es muy carismatico.

Armando esta muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias al apoyo que le han  brindado el podra realizar un mantenimiento general a su vehiculo y de esta manera podra tener un vehiculo en buenas condiciones y poder conducir de manera mas segura, asi seguira luchando para poder hacer realidad su mas grande sueño:" Tener su empresa de Taxis y darle una buena profesion a su hijo".
texts.en:
Armando is a very hardworking young man. He lives in the city of Carhuaz, located in the Peruvian sierra with temperatures between 11 and 21 °C. This city is also characterized by having one of the most popular tourist attractions, which is the Nevado de Pastoruri. It also has the "Shaqsha" dancers. Armando lives with his wife and from their union they have a small son for whom Armando would give his life. He loves him very much and that is why he works hard to be able to offer him a worthy life and above all make him into a good person. Armando is a young man who really wants to get ahead and that is why every day he goes out to work as a taxi driver. With this work, he pays for his household expenses. He believes that his work is going well for him because he is very friendly with his passengers and above all because he is charismatic.

Armando is very grateful to the Kiva lenders for the help they have offered him. With it, he will be able to do general maintenance on his vehicle and that way have a vehicle in good condition and be able to drive more safely. This way, he can keep fighting to make his biggest dream come true: "having a taxi business and giving his son a good career".

loans.use: to do maintenance on his car.

loans.name: English Rochel

texts.es:
Doña English es una persona esforzada dedicada a brindar servicios médicos en un centro hospitalario de san Rafael del sur, con sus ingresos a logrado aportar un poquito para tener un hogar propio en los que sus hijos puedan sentirse orgullosos pero para eso es necesario de organismos como KIVA que ven el esfuerzo para lograr sus sueños.
Es una persona con buen carácter en donde sus obligaciones son pagadas en forma y tiempo para que sus puertas estén siempre abiertas esto para continuar con su meta.
 Con este crédito espera terminar las partes que son más necesarias para tener su hogar como lo son el techo y sus puertas. Es madre de dos hijos de los cuales ambos están en las edades escolares los que espera que continúen sus estudios para que tengan mejores oportunidades en la vida.
texts.en:
The borrower, English, is a hardworking person devoted to providing medical services to a hospital in San Rafael del Sur. With her earnings she is able to contribute a little towards having her own home so her children can feel proud but to do this it is necessary for organizations like Kiva in order for them to see their dreams achieved. 

She is a good person of good character who pays her obligations in a timely way so that the doors are always open in order to continue towards her goal.

With this loan she will finish the most necessary parts of her house such as the roof and doors. She is the mother of two children, both school age, and she expects them to continue their studies in order to have better opportunities in life.

loans.use: to buy construction supplies such as zinc, sand, and cement

loans.name: Blanca Irene

texts.es:
Blanca Irene de 62 años de edad, es una mujer a la que le ha tocado rebuscarse la vida para educar a sus dos hijos. Se separó de su esposo por lo cual tuvo que asumir las obligaciones del hogar y sostener su familia debido a que su ex compañero nunca le colaboró con el sostenimiento de sus hijos.

En búsqueda de  una fuente de ingresos decidió montar en su vivienda una tienda en la que labora diariamente, con esta actividad ha podido solventar las necesidades y mejorar su calidad de vida. En la actualidad se encuentra solicitando un crédito con el cual comprará una nevera, debido a que algunos de sus productos se están descomponiendo por falta de refrigeración y el dinero restante lo invertirá en la compra de cerveza para su negocio.

Su mayor sueño es poder aumentar sus ingresos para tener una estabilidad económica.
texts.en:
Blanca Irene is a 62-year-old woman who has had to find ways to educate her children. When she separated from her husband, she became responsible for the household and providing for her family because he did not contribute child support. Searching for an income source, she decided to open a store in her house where she could work every day, and she has thus been able to pay expenses and improve the family's circumstances. 

She is applying for a loan to buy a refrigerator because some of her products are spoiling for lack of refrigeration. She will use the remaining money to buy beer for her business. Her dream is to increase her income and achieve financial stability.

loans.use: to buy a refrigerator and beer.

loans.name: Elkin Ferney

texts.es:
Elkin a sus 30 años de edad, se proyecta con  un gran empresario. Desde su niñez soñó con tener negocio propio y colaborarle a sus padres con las obligaciones de la casa. Todos los días se levanta muy temprano y se dirige abrir su tienda para comenzar su faena. 
Su trabajo le ha permitido tener la oportunidad de terminar su bachillerato y su gran reto es poder tener la oportunidad de ingresar a la universidad para convertirse en un gran hombre de negocios.

Sueña con poder ofrecerle a su familia una vivienda propia y olvidarse del alquiler que mes a mes debe pagar. Asegura que sus padres han sido su gran inspiración y que por ello luchará para ofrecerles una mejor calidad de vida.
Se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá en la compra de surtido para incrementar el volumen de ventas y obtener mayores ingresos.
texts.en:
Elkin is 30 years old and plans on being a great businessman. Since his childhood, he has dreamed of having his own business and helping his parents with the household expenses. He gets up early every day and goes to his store to start his tasks.
 
His job has allowed him to have the opportunity to finish his high school degree and his big challenge is to be able to have the chance to go to the university to become a great businessman.

He dreams of being able to offer his family a house of their own and forget about renting. He says that his parents have been a big inspiration and that is why he will fight to offer them a better quality of life.

He is asking for a loan to invest in buying stock to increase his sales volume and obtain more income.

loans.use: to buy basic family basket products.

loans.name: Marcial

texts.es:
Marcial es un hombre de 29 años, vive en la ciudad de Chiclayo, en el distrito de Guadalupe con su esposa y sus dos pequeños hijos, a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, el es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que dedica todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad de trabajar, Marcial no pudo estudiar la carrera profesional de Ingeniería Mecánica, pero le hubiera gustado mucho poder hacerlo, en sus ratos libres le gusta ver televisión y en algunas ocasiones cocina unos riquísimos Tallarines para compartir con su familia.
