Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Marcial trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de emolientes y los fines de semana trabaja como chofer de mototaxi, el trabaja todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana y puede hacerlo por un aproximado de 8 horas, el se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le va bien por su experiencia y por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes.
Marcial se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de una mototaxi, ya que con la que trabaja actualmente es alquilada, de esta manera el podrá contar con su propia herramienta de trabajo, así pues él seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de tener su propia empresa de transporte.
texts.en: Marcial is twenty-nine and lives in the city of Chiclayo, in the Guadalupe district, with his wife and their two small children, whom they love above all else. He is a very nice, hard-working, and enthusiastic person, who spares no effort to try to improve his family's lot in life. Unfortunately, due to a lack of economic resources that made it necessary for him to start working, Marcial was not able to study mechanical engineering, which is what he would have liked to do. In his spare time, he likes to watch television and sometimes cooks delicious pasta to share with his family. Marcial, with lots of effort and dedication, started his own business selling emollients. On week-ends, he works as a mototaxi driver. He starts work early every morning and works about eight hours a day. He is happy with his work and attributes his success to his experience and his amiable manner towards customers. Marcial is very grateful to Kiva lenders, since, thanks to their help, he will be able to buy his own mototaxi, to replace the one he currently rents. Owning this vehicle  will be the first step towards making his dream of having his own transportation business become reality.

loans.use: to buy a mototaxi.

loans.name: Cesar Augusto

texts.es:
Cesar de 47 años de edad, es padre de cuatro hijos, por los cuales se esmera día a día para ofrecerles una buena educación. Aprendió el oficio de panadería gracias un curso que realizó en  un instituto de formación. Posteriormente realizó un préstamo para iniciar su negocio y convertirse en un microempresario. Hoy lleva 8 años en su panadería y agradece la oportunidad que le regaló Dios para generar ingresos y ofrecerle a su familia una condición de vida digna. Su mayor sueño es poder consolidar su proyecto de empresa y generar fuentes de empleo a otras personas.

Se encuentra solicitando un crédito para la compra de un horno e insumos para la elaboración de sus productos, con el fin de incrementar sus ganancias y ampliar su negocio.
texts.en:
Cesar, 47, is the father of four children for whom he works hard each day to give them a good education. He learned bread making by attending an institutional training program. Later he obtained a loan to start his micro business. He has run his bakery for eight years and thanks God for the chance to earn income to offer his family a dignified life.

He dreams of growing his business and creating jobs for others. He is applying for a loan to buy an oven and ingredients to make his products so that he can increase profits and grow the business.

loans.use: to buy an oven and ingredients to make his products.

loans.name: Gladis Patricia

texts.es:
Gladis de 42 años de edad, ha laborado en el sector de la confección desde hace 15 años, actividad que le permitió adquirir la experiencia y la madurez para montar su propio negocio y trabajar como independiente.

Su hija de 4 años de edad, le demanda mucho tiempo, por lo cual tomó la determinación de retirarse de su trabajo y crear su empresa, labora diariamente de ocho de la mañana a cuatro de la tarde dependiendo el volumen del trabajo. El resto del tiempo lo comparte con su familia. 
Sueña con poder comprarse una máquina fileteadora, la cual le permitirá entregar prendas de mejor calidad y agilizar la entrega de las mismas, por esta razón se encuentra solicitando un crédito ya que no cuenta con los recursos monetarios.
texts.en:
Gladis is 42 years old. She has been working in the garment industry for 15 years, an activity that allowed her to acquire the experience and maturity to start her own business and to work towards becoming independent.

Her daughter who is 4 years old, demands a lot of time, so she has decided to leave her job and start her own business, working everyday from 8:00AM in the morning until 4:00PM in the afternoon depending on the volume of work. The rest of her time she shares with her family.

She dreams of being able to buy an overlocking sewing machine, so that she can deliver the best quality garments and expedite their delivery, and this is the reason she is asking for a loan as she does not have the monetary resources.

loans.use: to buy an overlocking sewing machine

loans.name: Hazbleidy

texts.es:
Hazbleidy de 20 años, es madre de una pequeña de 4 años de edad la cual es  su mayor motivación y la razón para más importante para querer salir adelante.
Se dedica a la confección de terceros en un pequeño taller ubicado en la sala de la casa de su madre. Labora todos los días desde muy temprano con el fin de generar los ingresos suficientes para ofrecerle a su hija una mejor calidad de vida. 
Su vida no ha sido fácil, pues por haberse convertido en madre a tan temprana edad, muchos de sus sueños se vieron truncados ya que el padre de su hijo nunca se hizo responsable. Se vio en la necesidad de colocarse a laborar para poder sostenerse, su madre ha sido su gran apoyo pero no cuenta con los recursos para ofrecerle mejores condiciones de vida. Por esta razón sueña en convertirse en una microempresaria y  para lograrlo se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá en la compra de una máquina plana e insumos para incrementar los niveles de producción y generar mayores ingresos.
texts.en:
Hazbleidy, 20, is the mother of a four-year-old daughter, who is her main reason for trying to get ahead. She does sewing piecework in her workshop in her mother's dining room. She works every day from early morning to earn enough income to offer her daughter a better life. Her life has not been easy. Since she became a mother at an early age and her daughter's father was irresponsible, her dreams were cut short, and she found it necessary to work to support herself and her child. 

Though her mother has been a great help, she doesn't have the resources to improve their circumstances. Hazbleidy's dream is to have a micro business, and she needs a loan to invest in a sewing machine and supplies to increase production and generate more income.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine, fabric, and thread.

loans.name: Juana

texts.es:
La socia Juana se dedica al negocio de restuarant,la socia prepara desayunos,almuerzos y cenas,la socia prepara platos como pollo al horno,sopas y estofados de pollos,la socia se dedica a este negocio 7 años y le va muy bien,en sus tiempos libres a la socia le gusta salir a pasear,el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de restaurant.La socia solicita el credito para comprar productos para cocinar como pollo,carne y verduras.

La socia esta feliz con el credito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Juana works at her restaurant preparing breakfast, lunch, and dinner.  She prepares dishes such as roast chicken and chicken soups and stews.  She has had this business for seven years and it is going very well.  In her free time, she likes to go out walking.  Her dream is to expand the restaurant.  

She is requesting this loan to purchase ingredients for cooking such as chicken, meat, and vegetables.  She is happy with the loan provided and promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients such as chicken, meat, and vegetables.

loans.name: Nubia Del Carmen

texts.es:
La Actividad de la sra. Nubia es comerciante tiene una pulpería ubicada en su casa de habitación venta de granos básicos, productos lácteos como leche, queso, crema, golosinas, entre otros. Sus compras las realiza en el mercado municipal y otros productos llegan los distribuidores al negocio.
Doña Nubia es originaria del municipio, es una persona luchador que ha venido desde abajo para poder tener su propio negocio y surtido de productos que son básicos y necesarios para el hogar.
Este cliente necesita un financiamiento para comprar más productos por que tiene una gran demanda de sus clientes. Su negocio ha crecido ahora tiene más clientela.
Es casada tiene dos hijo menores de edad en edad escolar.
Me siento muy bien por todos los financiamientos que me han otorgado que me han ayudado muchísimo en mi crecimiento como comerciante.
texts.en: Nubia owns a general store, located at her home. She sells basic grains, dairy products (milk, cheese, cream), and sweets, among others. She buys some of her merchandise at the town market and the rest from distributors. Nubia lives in her hometown. She fought bravely against adversity to finally own her shop and stock it with basic products needed for the home. Nubia needs a loan to buy more products to face rising demand, as she has more customers since her business has grown. She is married and has two children, who go to school. She is very happy with all the loans she received as she tells us they have been very helpful to make her business grow.

loans.use: to buy basic goods such as rice, sugar, oil, and broad beans.

loans.name: Las Triunfadoras De Yanahuara Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “LAS TRIUNFADORAS DE YANAHUARA”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.                                                                                                                                                                                             

La socia es la Sra. Julia ella es soltera y tiene 39  años y tiene 2 hijos; La socia trabaja en su negocio de crianza de animales, la socia vende cuyes ,gallinas y chanchos, la socia los hace engordar y crecer y luego los vende en el mercado y en diferentes ferias, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene 7 años y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender los animales. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar gallinas, cuyes y chanchos y alimentos para los animales.
 Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de restaurant, negocio de tienda de abarrotes, negocio de venta de crianza de animales y negocio de servicio de taxi.

 
La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The community bank Las Triunfadoras de Yanahuara is located in the Urubamba district, which is in the province of Urubamba and department of Cusco.

Julia is a member of community bank.  She is 39 years old, single, and has two children.  She works raising animals.  She sells guinea pigs, chickens, and pigs.  She fattens and raises them and later sells them at the market and different fairs.  She works from 8:00am until 5:00pm.  She has done this work for seven years and it is going very well.  Her dream is to have a shop where she can sell the animals.  She is requesting this loan to purchase chickens, guinea pigs, and pigs, as well as feed for the animals.

The other members work at a restaurant, grocery store, raise and sell animals, and provide taxi service.

She is grateful to everyone who is a part of this dream and promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to purchase chickens, guinea pigs, and pigs and feed for the animals.

loans.name: Vicenta

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de compra y venta de madera,al socia tambien fabrica muebles,mesas,puetas y roperos,la socia ya tiene 7 años en este negocio y le va muy bien,por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos,el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de compra y venta de madera.La socia solicita el credito para comprar madera al por mayor.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: Vicenta continues to buy and sell wood and make furniture, tables, doors, and closets, as she has been successfully doing for the past seven years. The business has allowed her to support her children. She dreams of expanding her business and is applying for a loan to buy wholesale wood. She is pleased to have a loan and promises to make her payments.

loans.use: to buy wholesale wood.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy merchandise to sell.

loans.name: Hilda Marleni

texts.es:
Hilda es una mujer muy trabajadora, vive al lado de su parejay productos de su amor tienen 2 hijos a quienes quiere mucho y por los cuales trabaja muy duro cada dia para poder brindarles una vida digna y sobre tode para que puedan ser personas de bien. Hilda no pudo tener una carrera universitaria debido a sus pocos recursos economicos pero le hubiera encantado estudiar la carrera de enfermeria. 

Día a dia Hilda trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de chupetes y gelatinas, ella se dedica a su negocio alrededor de 9 horas al dia y puede atender hasta 30 clientes en el dia; ella cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es muy abale con los clientes y sobre todo tiene mucho carisma para las ventas.

Hilda esta muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podra comprar vitrinas para su negocio de esta manera podra  exhibir mejor sus productos y podra mejorar sus ingresos y podra seguir luchando para poder hacer realidad su mas grande sueño:" Tener un local propios y iniciar su negocio de venta de ropa".
texts.en: Hilda is a very hard-working woman. She lives with her spouse, with whom she has two children, whom they love very much. It is for their sake that she works hard every day, so that they can live with dignity and become honest people. Hilda could not attend university because of her scant resources, but she would have loved to become a nurse. She works every day at her small business, selling lollipops and moulded jelly. She works about nine hours a day and can tend to as many as thirty customers per day. She attributes her success to her charisma as a saleswoman and to her amiability towards customers. Hilda is very grateful to Kiva lenders, since, thanks to their help, she will be able to buy display cases for her business. Her products will be more visible and her sales will increase, enabling her to keep fighting to make her greatest dream come true: "I want to buy a shop and start selling clothes".

loans.use: to buy display cases.

loans.name: Gladys Judith

texts.es:
La Señora. Gladys se encuentra gozando de muy buena salud al igual que todos los miembros de su familia, forma parte del banco comunal Cochapamba hace algunos años y todo ese tiempo le ha permitido estrechar los lasos de amistad con sus amigas del grupo. Vive en la parroquia del Valle en Cuenca lugar donde su gente se dedica a la agricultura y crianza de animales, son personas amables, gentiles y aun mantienen su cultura y tradiciones.

Doña Gladys tiene 26 años, es casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido un hijo de 7 años de edad que está estudiando en una escuelita de la ciudad. Su esposo labora en la construcción como albañil, la casa en la que vive es de su propiedad.

La Señora. Gladys en sus actividades económicas le va muy bien ya que se dedica a trabajar en la limpieza de casas y también en su casa a más de dedicarse a los quehaceres del hogar se dedica a la cría de cerdos y pollos a los que vende en la ciudad cuando tiene alguna necesidad económica.
 
Su crédito lo va a utilizar para comprar cerdos, pollos y alimento para sus animales.
texts.en:
Gladys and her family are healthy. Several years ago, she joined the communal bank Cochapamba, and since then her friendship with the other members has grown. She lives in Valle parish in Cuenca, where the friendly, courteous residents farm and raise livestock and still maintain their traditions and culture. 

Doña Gladys is 26, married, and has a seven-year-old son from her marriage who attends a small school in the city. Her husband is a bricklayer, and they own the house they live in. Gladys's financial situation is good because she cleans houses for others. In addition to doing her own household chores, she raises pigs and chickens to sell in the city when she needs extra income. She will use the loan is to buy pigs, chickens, and animal feed.

loans.use: to buy pigs, chickens, and animal feed.

loans.name: Ysabel

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de compra y venta de carteras y ropa como pantalones,blusas y chompas,ella sigue vendiendo en forma independiente desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene 7 años en este negocio y le va muy bien,en sus tiempos libres a la socia le gusta salir a pasear,el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de venta y compra de carteras y ropa.La socia solicita le credito para comprar carteras y pantalones y chompas.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Ysabel continues to make a living buying and selling purses and clothing such as pants, blouses and sweaters. She still sells these independently from 8:00 am to 6:00 pm. She has been in this business for seven years, and is doing very well.

In her free time Ysabel enjoys going for walks. Her dream is to expand her business buying and selling purses and clothing. She is requesting the loan to buy purses, pants and sweaters.

Ysabel is grateful for the loan and is committed to meeting her loan repayments.

loans.use: to buy purses, pants and sweaters.

loans.name: Luzmila

texts.es:
La socia Luzmila se dedica al negocio de restaurant,la socia prepara desayunos,almuerzos y cenas,la socia prepara pollo al horno,sopas,estofado de carne,la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene 9 años en este negocio y le va muy bien,el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de restaurant.La socia solicita el credito para comprar pollo,verduras y carnes.

La socia esta contenta con el credito y se ocmpromete a cumplir los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: Luzmila runs a restaurant, where she serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner. She offers roast chicken, soups, and meat stews from 8:00 a.m until 7:00 p.m. She has managed the business for nine years, and it is prospering. She dreams of expanding it and is applying for a loan to buy chickens, vegetables, and meats. She is pleased to have the loan and promises to make her payments.

loans.use: to buy chickens, vegetables, and meats.

loans.name: Karen

texts.es:
La socia Karen se dedica al negocio de venta de juguetes,la socia vende muñecas,carros y juegos,la socia ya tiene 8 años en este negocio y le va muy bien,la socia trabaja desde las 7:00 a.m hasta las 8:00 p.m,el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de tienda de abarrotes.La socia solicita el credito para comprar muñecas,carros y juegos.
La socia esta contenta con el credito y se compromete a cumplir los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Karen has a business selling toys.  She sells dolls, cars, and games.  She has had this business for eight years and it is going very well.  She works from 7:00am until 8:00pm.  Her dream is to expand the business to a grocery store.  

She is requesting this loan to purchase dolls, cars, and games.  She is happy with the loan and promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to purchase dolls, cars, and games.

loans.name: Jaquelin Karina

texts.es:
Jaquelin es una mujer de 31 años, vive en la ciudad de Chincha con su esposo y sus dos pequeños hijos, a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que junto con su esposo, dedican todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia; gracias a su esfuerzo y al apoyo de sus padres, Jaquelin pudo estudiar la carrera profesional de Educación, en sus ratos libres le gusta preparar postres y en algunas ocasiones cocina una riquísima Carapulcra con Sopa Seca para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Jaquelin trabaja en su pequeño negocio de elaboración y venta de postres, como tortas, alfajores, tortas heladas y otros, adicionalmente también trabaja como Profesora de educación primaria, ella trabaja todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana y puede hacerlo por un aproximado de 8 horas, ella se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le va bien por su buena sazón y por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes. 
Jaquelin se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de materiales de construcción, como cemento, arena y otros, con ello desea hacer el tarrajeo y pintado de su vivienda, así pues ella podrá brindar mayor bienestar y seguridad para su familia, de esta manera ella seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de ser una gran pastelera.
texts.en:
Jaquelin, 31, lives in the city of Chincha with her husband and her two small children, whom she loves and who are her main motivation in life.  She's a very friendly, hardworking, and enthusiastic woman.  She and her husband devote all their effort to getting their family ahead.  Thanks to her effort and the support of her parents, Jaquelin was able to study education.  In her free time she likes to make desserts and sometimes she cooks a delicious "carapulcra" [pork stew] to share with her family.

On her own initiative and with a lot of effort and dedication, Jaquelin works in her small business making and selling cakes, "alfajores" [sandwich cookie], ice cream cakes, and other desserts.  She also works as an elementary school teacher.  She works every day from early in the morning, and can work for approximately eight hours.  She's comfortable doing her job and believes it's going well for her because of her good seasoning and her friendly customer service.

Jacquelin is very grateful to the Kiva lenders because thanks to their help she'll be able to buy cement, sand, and other construction materials to plaster and paint her house.  This way she'll continue working and making the effort the achieve her big dream of being a great pastry chef.

loans.use: to buy construction materials

loans.name: Martín

texts.es: Martín, tiene la edad  de 40 años, está casado, vive con sus hijos y esposa, los cual es su mayor prioridad. Él con su crédito pretende hacer la compra de fertilizantes y otros productos para que la plantación pueda tener una mejor producción, además pagar mano de obra para la aplicación de los productos y trabajos de asistencia de la plantación, y de esta manera asegurarse de realizar un buen trabajo. Lo que pretende es aprovechar las buenas condiciones de clima y suelo que cuenta para este cultivo, y también poner en práctica la experiencia de varios años en el manejo de granos básicos. Además de poder comprar los mejores productos y de mejor calidad para que su plantación tenga un buen desarrollo y sanidad de la cosecha, y tener a corto plazo una producción adecuada. Con el ingreso de la cosecha que espera obtener  la utilizará en el bienestar y estudio de su familia y cumplir con algunas metas familiares y seguir invirtiendo más en los cultivos. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Él no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Martín is 40 years old, married, and lives with his children and wife, who are his main priority.  He hopes to use this loan to purchase fertilizer and other agricultural products so that his crops have the best production.  He will also pay laborers to apply the products and work in the fields so that he can assure good work.  He aims to take advantage of the good weather conditions and soil conditions for this crop and put into practice his many years of experience managing crops of basic grains.  

He will be able to purchase the best quality products so that his crops will have good development and health and have good production in a short time.  With the income he hopes to earn from the harvest, he will care for the well-being and education of his family, meet some familiy goals, and continue investing more in his crops.  

This is the first loan he has received from FUDECOSUR.  He has not had loans from other state banks, but FUDECOSUR has provided a loan with better facilities and much lower interest rates.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and pay laborers to help with his bean crop.

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es: Francisco, tiene la edad  de 76 años, está casado, vive con su esposa que es su mayor prioridad. Con su crédito pretende hacer la compra de de productos foliares para aplicarle en el periodo de verano y que durante seste tiempo permanezcan en una buena condición además de  pagar mano de otra en trabajos de asistencia para el café. Además de poder comprar unas plantas de almácigo para realizar resiembras y así aumentar la densidad de plantas por área, además de aprovechar la buena fertilidad del suelo y las condiciones de clima y otras que favorecen al cultivo de café. Con estas mejoras al cultivo espera obtener un poco de ganancias y así mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia y también invertir un poco más en el área de cultivo y también cumplir algunas metas personales.  Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Él no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Francisco is a 76-year old married man that lives with his wife, who is his biggest priority. He plans to use the requested loan to buy fertilizers for the summer season so that the land will remain in good condition, and to hire someone to help with the coffee plantation. He also wants to buy copperwood seeds to cultivate with an aim to increase the plants' density by area and to seize the good fertility of the land and the favorable weather conditions for cultivating coffee. Thanks to these improvements, he expects to obtain some earnings and improve the life conditions of his family. He also wants to invest some more in the land and to pursue some personal goals. 

This is his first loan from FUDECOSUR. He hasn't had any other loans before with national banks, but FUDECOSUR has offered this loan with better conditions and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to make improvements to his coffee plantation.

loans.name: José Daniel

texts.es: José Daniel, tiene la edad  de 48 años, está casado, vive con sus hijos y esposa los cuales son su mayor prioridad. Con su crédito pretende hacer la compra de alambre para la reparación de cercas y la compra de semilla de pasto para tener potreros bien poblados de pasto y con un mejor rendimiento por área, además de comprar algunos terneros para el engorde. Lo que pretende es aprovechar los precios bajos en algunos terneros y que son  de buena calidad. Con las mejoras realizadas en los potreros y la compra de nuevos terneros espera obtener más ingresos y así mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia y tener una mayor superación personal y además de invertir más en la actividad y ser más competitivo y poder aprovechar las ventajas de las buenas condiciones de la propiedad para el desarrollo del ganado. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. No había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
José Daniel, 48, is married.  He lives with his children and his wife, who are his biggest priority.

With his loan he plans to buy wire to repair fences and grass seed to have a lot of grass in his pastures and a better yield.  He also will buy some calves to fatten.  He plans to take advantage of low prices on some good-quality calves.

With these improvements to his pasture and the purchase of new calves, he hopes to get more income, improve his family's living conditions, and have greater personal improvement.  He also hopes to invest more in his job and be more competitive to make the most of the advantages of the good conditions of his property for livestock.

This is the first loan he has received from FUDECOSUR.  He had not had previous loans in state banks, but FUDECOSUR offered him a loan with better terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to improve his farm and to buy calves

loans.name: Norma Herlinda

texts.es:
En el balneario de San Clemente del Cantón Sucre cada quince días se reúne el Banco Comunal 1 de Diciembre. Este lugar es conocido por sus hermosas playa que son muy visitadas por muchos turistas nacionales y extranjeros,  ofrece diversidad de lugares hermosos y una rica variedad de platos típicos de la región.

En este lugar vive la señora Norma, tiene 48 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen tres hijos los mismos que ya son mayores de edad dos de ellos aun viven en su casa. Su esposo es chofer.

Doña Norma es  una gran ama de casa que para obtener sus propios recursos se dedica a la venta de productos naturales y productos de Esika (productos de belleza, cosméticos, perfumería y accesorios para damas). Su forma de venta es puerta a puerta y trabaja cinco  días a la semana de una o dos horas diarias y en los momentos que está desocupada, no tiene un horario fijo, deja sus productos a crédito y cobra cada semana. Tiene 9  años que se dedica a esta actividad y le va muy bien,  que lo que más vende son los productos naturales  ya que son muy buenos.

Este crédito es para comprar productos naturales, perfumes, cremas, cosméticos y bisutería. Lleva más de 13 años  en el Banco Comunal y le gusta porque los créditos le permiten salir adelante. 

Sus sueños son seguir adelante en su vida personal y en su negocio.
texts.en:
The “1 de Diciembre” communal bank meets every two weeks in “San Clemente del Cantón Sucre.”  This area is known for its beautiful beaches that are well visited by many local and foreign tourists.  It offers diversity in its beauty and rich variety of typical regional dishes.

Norma lives here.  She is 48 years old, married, and has three adult children; two of them still live at home.  Her husband is a driver.

Norma is a great housewife who sells natural and Esika products (beauty products, cosmetics, perfumes, and accessories for ladies)   She sells door to door five days a week, one or two hours a day and when she has some free time.  She doesn’t have a fixed schedule and sells on credit, collecting every week.  She’s been doing this for nine years and things are going well for her.  Most of her sales come from the natural products because they are very good. 

She will use the money from this loan to buy natural products, perfumes, creams, cosmetics, and costume jewelry.  She has been with the communal bank for more than 13 years and she likes it because the loans help her get ahead.

Her dreams are to continue ahead with her personal life and her business.

loans.use: to buy inventory.

loans.name: Ilham

texts.en:
Ilham is a 45-year-old farmer. He lives with his wife and four children. Three of the children are still in school. Ilham has been farming for 25 years, producing milk and milk products and raising animals that he sells at the local market in his area. His family has no additional source of income.

Ilham is requesting a 1,600 Azerbaijan new manat loan from VisionFund AzerCredit (VFAC) to buy one head of cattle. This will provide him with more products and increase his income that will help boost his living standards and pay for his children’s education. Ilham plans to expand his farm to guarantee the future of his children.

loans.use: to buy one head of cattle.

loans.name: Shahin

texts.en:
Shahin is 43 years old. He lives with his wife and four children aged 5, 13, 15 and 17. Three of them are in school. He runs an agricultural business. In particular, he has three milk cows whose milk is used in milk products. Also, he sells cattle that he buys as calves, fattens and resells locally at a good price. Shahin is a very hardworking man with 17 years experience in his business. In future, he plans to increase his number of breeding animals. 
He requested a loan to purchase one milk cow. This will increase the income of the family. This cow will provide him with more milk produce and earn extra income that will improve his living standards and pay for his children’s education. 

Lack of a readily available market and his own land to graze animals are his major challenges in farming.

loans.use: to purchase one milk cow.

loans.name: Hasangulu

texts.en:
Hasangulu, 58, is a married man with one infant. Because of a lack of money, he has started working in agriculture. He raises and sells cattle, milk products and clover. His wife receives a pension. However, the income they earn is not enough, and he needs more support to cover his family's needs. 

Hasangulu is requesting a loan of AZN 1600 to cover the costs of purchasing sheep and expanding and improving the herd's condition. The main challenge he faces is the lack of water on his land.

loans.use: to buy more sheep.

loans.name: Taleh

texts.en:
Taleh is 30 years old. He is married and lives with his father who earns a 110 Azerbaijani manat (AZN) pension. Taleh earns a living through agriculture, selling yogurt, milk, cheese and meat. He has land under crop but because of a lack of money he can not engage in planting there.

This will be his third time requesting a loan via VFAC (Kiva's partner). Taleh is seeking a loan of 800 AZN in order to support his business by buying trefoil. This loan will help to support feeding his animals, and he can increase his income.  He dreams of having a big family and tries to improve his family’s standard of living.

loans.use: To buy trefoil to support his animals.

loans.name: Elshad

texts.en: Elshad is a 30-year-old married man with three children. His main business is selling milk, yogurt, cheese and curd. With the income he earns, he has started to buy barley seed and sows the land that he owns. He is selling the harvest to generate additional income. The diseases of animals and high drug costs hinder his business. His plan for the future is to increase the number of his animals. With this loan, Elshad intends to buy a cow that will be the first step to his goal and will increase his milk production.

loans.use: to buy a cow to increase milk production.

loans.name: Lucy

texts.en:
Lucy is a 58-year-old businesswoman and single mother of three children. She has been running a medical clinic for the past ten years with the monthly income of 6,000 KES, which she uses to support her family. 

She is applying for her third loan term with KADET, after repaying the previous loans successfully. She plans to use the loan to buy more drugs for her clinic. She anticipates some profits from the business, which she will set aside to cater to her children’s education.

Her hopes are to expand her business and improve her family's standard of living.

loans.use: To buy drugs for her clinic.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary is a 64-year-old widow with four children. She practices mixed crop farming and has been in the farming business for the past 11 years with a monthly income of KES 9,400, which she uses to support her family. 

Mary is applying for her fourth loan term after successfully repaying the previous loans. She plans to use the loan to buy seedlings and fertilizer for her farm, in preparation for the next planting season. She anticipates some profits from her farming activities and she plans to set aside some money to be able to cater to her children’s education.

Mary’s dreams are to buy a piece of land and to build rental houses, which will increase her monthly income and, hence, improve the family's living standard.

loans.use: to buy seedlings and fertilizer for her farm.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more gas cylinders for resale.

loans.name: Maxwell

texts.en:
Maxwell is a 25-year-old businessman and single. He supports his parents. He has been running a mobile accessories and M-Pesa shop for the past three years with a monthly income of KES 10,000, which he uses to support his family. 

He is applying for his first loan term with Kenya Agency for Development of Enterprise and Technology (KADET) after being introduced by a staff member.  Maxwell will use the loan to buy a stock of mobile phones. With the anticipated profit from the business, he will expand the business. His dreams are to buy a car and to use it as a car hire, which will increase his monthly income.

loans.use: to buy a stock of mobile phones.

loans.name: Geoffrey

texts.en:
Geoffrey is still running the tailoring business and he is happy with the progress of the business. He is also still happily married to Joyce and they now have four children. 

Geoffrey is applying for another loan after successfully repaying the previous loan. He will use the loan to buy textile materials and another sewing machine since he wants to expand his business. With the anticipated profit from the business, he will educate his children. His dreams are to open a boutique shop and to improve the family's living standard.

loans.use: to buy textile materials and another sewing machine for his tailoring business.

loans.name: Kennedy

texts.en:
Kennedy is a 35-year-old businessman. He is married to Veronica and they are blessed with two children. He has been running an insurance company for the past three years, which he opened with the grant given to him by his parents. Kennedy earns a monthly income of 19,000 KES. 

He is applying for his first loan term after being introduced to KADET by an existing customer. He will use the loan to market his company. He hopes that the marketing exercise will increase the number of clientele in his company and that he will generate more money which he will use in part to buy more furniture for his company. 

His future dreams are to own a big insurance company and offer better insurance services.

loans.use: To market his insurance company.

loans.name: Caroline

texts.en:
Caroline is a 26-year-old mixed crop farmer. She is married to Aram, who is a businessman, and they are blessed with one child. 

Caroline has been in the farming business for the past two years. She earns a monthly income of KES 6,000, which she uses to support her family. 

She is applying for her first loan term with KADET, after being introduced by a staff member. She will use the loan to buy seedlings and fertilizer for her farm for the next planting season. With the anticipated profit from the business, she will educate her child. 

Caroline’s dreams are to buy a piece of land and build rental houses, which will increase her monthly income and hence improve the family’s living standard.

loans.use: to buy seedlings and fertilizer for her farm.

loans.name: Karpala Group

texts.fr:
Mme ADISSA est responsable du groupe  KARPALA. Mariée, elle est mère de 05 enfants. Le plus âgé a 33ans et le moins âgés à 18 ans. 01 vont  à l’école et elle a 05 personnes  en charge.
Mme vend de la farine de manioc (placalie) et des chaussures depuis 27ans.  Elle s’approvisionne à Abidjan. Ses clients sont les femmes et les revendeurs du marché de sankayaaré.
Elle veut s’acheter 05 sacs de farine de manioc (placalie).
Elle  veut avec  ses bénéfices renforcer son activité. Mme  ambitionne épargner et contruire une maison d’habitation sur sa parcelle.
texts.en:
Adissa is the representative of the KARPALA group.  She is married and the mother of five children.  Her oldest child is 33 years old, the youngest is 18.  One of her children attends school.  She has five people in her care.

Adissa has been selling cassava flour (placalie) and shoes for the past 27 years.  She buys her goods in Abidjan.  Her customers are women and resellers at the Sankayaaré market.

She wants to buy five bags of cassava flour (placalie).

With her profits, she intends to strengthen her activity.  Her ambition is to save some money and to build a house on her plot of land.

loans.use: to buy five bags of "placalie" (cassava flour).

loans.name: Sakhavat

texts.en:
Sakhavat is 28 years old and lives with his wife and two children, ages two and seven. He works as a teacher in the district where he lives and where he is involved in agricultural activities. Sakhavat has milk cows and cattle. He is a very hardworking man and does his best to insure a good income for his family.

Sakhavat is requesting a loan in order to purchase construction supplies to finish the repair of his home, because he considers it necessary for his family's comfort.

This is his fourth loan, and he says that the first loan he obtained helped him to improve his business and family's living conditions.

loans.use: To finish repair work at home.

loans.name: Wendsongdo Group

texts.fr:
Mme MARIAM est responsable du groupe  WENDSONGDO. Mariée, elle est mère de 06 enfants. Le plus âgé a 25ans et le moins âgés à 13 ans. 01 va  à l’école et elle a 06 personnes  en charge.
Mme vend des condiments  et de la farine depuis 25ans.  Elle s’approvisionne au marché de son secteur. Ses clients sont les  voisins (hommes, femmes et les enfants).
Elle veut s’acheter 02 sacs de maïs et 10 plats de gombo sec.
Elle  veut avec  ses bénéfices renforcer son activité. Mme  ambitionne aider son mari dans les charges familiales et mieux s’occuper de ses enfants.
texts.en:
Mariam is the representative of the WENDSONGDO group.  She is married and the mother of six children.  Her oldest child is 25 years old, and the youngest is 13.  One of her children goes to school.  She has six people in her care.

Mariam has been selling condiments and flour for 25 years.  She buys her goods at the local market and resells to her neighbors (men, women and children).

She wants to buy two bags of maize and ten bowls of dry gumbo (okra).

With her profits, she intends to strengthen her activity.  Her ambition is to help her husband with the household expenses and to take better care of her children.

loans.use: to buy 2 bags of maize and 10 bowls of dry gumbo (okra).

loans.name: Svetlana

texts.ru: Светлана использовала предыдущий кредит на лечение зубов. За последний год она развила свой бизнес - изготовление свадебных декораций и решила окончательно уйти с работы воспитателя, т.к. там она получала очень маленькую зарплату. Светлана - очень активная и целеустремленная девушка. Ее цель - развить свой бизнес, чтобы иметь возможность снимать свое собственное жилье. Светлана просит предоставить ей кредит для закупки материала для декорации свабедных авто и помещений. Ей очень нравится заниматься свадебной декорацией и похоже, что клиентам Светланы ее работа тоже очень нравится.
texts.en: Svetlana used her previous loan for dentistry work.  In the past year she has grown her business - making wedding decorations and decided to stop working as a preschool teacher as she earned a very small salary there.  Svetlana is a very active and goal oriented young woman.  Her goal is to expand her business in order to be able to rent her own residence.  Svetlana is asking for a loan to purchase materials to decorate wedding cars and interiors.  She enjoys making wedding decorations and it seems that Svetlana's clients also like her work very much.

loans.use: to purchase materials for wedding decorations

loans.name: Veronica

texts.en:
Veronica is a 47-year-old business lady, married to Peter, who is a businessman, and they are blessed with four children. She has been running a retail shop for the past two years. She uses her monthly income of 8,300 Kenyan shillings to support her family.

Veronica is applying for her first loan term with KADET after being introduced by a staff member. She plans to use this loan to buy more stock of sugar, rice and maize meal for her shop. With the anticipated profit from the business, she plans to save to be able to educate her children. Her dreams are to open a wholesale shop and improve the family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy more stock of sugar, rice and maize meal.

loans.name: Waogtaaba Group

texts.fr:
Mme SETOU est responsable du groupe  WAOGTAABA. Mariée, elle est mère de 06 enfants. Le plus âgé a 21ans et le moins âgés à 03 ans. 05 vont  à l’école et elle a 06 personnes  en charge.
Mme est restauratrice depuis 03ans.  Elle s’approvisionne au marché de son secteur. Ses clients sont les  voisins (hommes, femmes).
Elle veut s’acheter 02 sacs de riz, 01bidon d’huile et un tas de bois de chauffe pour la préparation.
Elle  veut  épargner  ses bénéfices. Mme  ambitionne agrandir son activité et aider son mari pour la scolarisation des enfants.
texts.en:
Setou is the representative of the WAOGTAABA group.  She is married and the mother of six children.  Her oldest child is 21 years old and the youngest is 3.  Five of her children are in school.  She has six people in her care.

Setou has been involved in the preparation of meals for the past three years.  She buys her supplies at the local market, in her district.  Her customers are her neighbors (men and women).

She wants to buy two bags of rice, one can of oil and some firewood to cook her dishes.

Setou intends to save her profits.  Her ambition is to expand her business and to help her husband cover the children's school fees.

loans.use: to buy two bags of rice, one can of oil and some firewood to cook her dishes.

loans.name: Samson

texts.en:
Samson is now 50 years old and still married to Lucy. Their children are still well and their business has also been doing well as he is now able to get 5,000 KES from the milk sales business. 

He is now applying for his second loan after repaying the previous loan successfully. He plans to use this amount to pay school fees for his children when schools reopen.

He hopes to educate his children up to the university level and improve the family living standard with his milk business.

loans.use: To buy fresh milk from farmers for sale.

loans.name: Jesús

texts.es:
Jesús de 36 años de edad, se dedica al oficio de moto-taxi  desde hace 6 meses, debido a que la empresa en donde laboraba se vio en la necesidad de realizar recorte de personal, por lo cual decidió invertir su liquidación en la compra de una motocicleta.
Con dos hijos menores de edad que son su mayor motivación para querer salir adelante y brindarles una buena educación, se levanta diariamente a conseguir pasajeros y obtener ingresos para el sostenimiento de su hogar. 
Se encuentra solicitando un crédito para terminar de cancelar su motocicleta y poder seguir con su actividad. Su mayor sueño es ver a su familia feliz y poderles ofrecer una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Jesús, who is 36 years old, has been a moto-taxi driver for six months due to the fact that the business where he was working found it necessary to cut back on its personnel, and he, therefore, decided to invest his severance in purchasing a motorcycle.

His two minor children are his primary motivation for wanting to advance and give them a good education. He gets up every day to transport passengers and earn a living to sustain his household.

He is requesting this loan to finish paying for his motorcycle and continue with his business. He biggest dream is to see his family be happy and to be able to give them a better quality of life.

loans.use: pay for a motorcycle

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: purchase a heavy-duty sewing machine and a tabletop sewing machine

loans.name: Jhon Alexander

texts.es:
Jhon de 22 años de edad, se dedica a la elaboración de calzado, oficio que aprendió gracias a la oportunidad que tuvo de acceder a un instituto de formación. Labora de lunes a domingo de 8 de la mañana a 6 de la tarde. Esta actividad le ha permitido generar ingresos que  destina para el sostenimiento de su hogar compuesto por su madre y un hermano menor.

Su mayor sueño es poder consolidar su negocio y abrirse paso como un gran empresario. Por esta razón se encuentra solicitando un crédito para la compra una pulidora, materia prima (tiras, corras, hebillas, suelas, forros y mantenimiento de una máquina. Con el propósito de aumentar sus ventas y mejorar su situación económica.
texts.en:
Jhon, who is 22 years old, makes shoes, a trade that he learned thanks to the opportunity he had to attend a trade school. He works Monday to Sunday from 8 am to 6 pm. This business has allowed him to earn an income that he uses to support his household, which is composed of his mother and younger brother.

His biggest dream is to be able to strengthen his business and make way for a major company. For this reason, he is requesting a loan to purchase a polishing machine and basic materials (leather strips, cords, buckles, soles, and linings) as well as maintain a machine. The goal is to grow his sales and improve his financial situation.

loans.use: purchase a polishing machine and basic materials (leather strips, cords, buckles, soles, and linings) as well as maintain a machine.

loans.name: Maria Santos

texts.es:
María tiene 62 años de edad, es madre soltera, tiene 4 hijos y ya están mayores, vive con dos de ellos en una colonia de la ciudad de San Pedro Sula.
Doña María tiene 10 años de haber iniciado su propio negocio de elaboración y venta de tortillas de maíz. Su decisión fue por el deseo de tener una fuente de ingresos para la manutención de su familia y le ha ido bien ya tiene buena clientela a quien atiende todos los días. Agradece mucho a ODEF y ahora a  Kiva por el apoyo financiero brindado ya que ha obtenido varios prestamos los cuales le han ayudado a superarse y a mejorar su calidad de vida. Este préstamo que ha solicitado es el numero doce y es por 11,000 Lempiras, con el cual va comprar harina de maíz y leña para seguir elaborando tortillas y también va comprar dos balcones de metal para terminar de reparar las ventanas de su casa. 
Su meta es trabajar mucho para seguir mejorando la calidad de vida para su familia, también ayudar a uno de sus hijos con los estudios.
texts.en:
Maria, 62, is a single mother of 4 adult children.  She lives with 2 of them in a neighborhood in the city of San Pedro Sula.  Maria started her own business making and selling corn tortillas 10 years ago.  She decided to do this because she wanted to have a source of income to support her family.  The business has done well; she now has good customers who buy from her every day.  

Maria really appreciates ODEF, and now Kiva, for the financial support she's been given, because the loans she has taken have helped her to succeed and improve her quality of life.  She is now requesting her 12th loan, for 11,000 Honduran lempiras.  With this loan, she is going to buy corn flour and firewood so that she can continue to make tortillas.  She will also buy metal balconies so that she can repair the windows of her house. 

Maria's goal is to work hard so that she can continue to improve her family's quality of life, and also help one of her children with their education.

loans.use: to buy corn and firewood to make tortillas, and to buy 2 metal balconies to repair the windows of her house

loans.name: Mariano Edgar

texts.es:
Mariano Edgar de 49 años de edad es un campesino dedicado a la lechería. Diariamente se levanta a las cuatro de la mañana para comenzar su faena. Esta actividad es la única fuente de ingresos para el sostenimiento de su familia compuesta por su esposa y tres hijos.
Su gran reto es sacar sus hijos adelante ya que se esmera por ofrecerles una  buena educación y para ello deben desplazarse diariamente a la zona urbana del municipio de Yarumal, Colombia para recibir clases.
Sueña con poder tener su propia finca y construir una vivienda para su familia. En el momento se encuentra solicitando un crédito para la compra de una vaca lechera con el fin de incrementar sus ingresos y empezar a construir sus sueños.
texts.en:
Mariano Edgar is 49 years old and is a farmer who works producing dairy products. He gets up at 4 am every day to start his jobs. This activity is his only source of income for supporting his family, made up of his wife and 3 children.

His biggest challenge is getting his children ahead, as he makes a great effort to offer them a good education and this means they have to travel every day to the town of Yarumal, Colombia for their classes.

He dreams of being able to have his own farm and build a home for his family. At the moment they find themselves asking for a loan to buy a dairy cow with the aim of increasing his income and starting to build his dreams.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow.

loans.name: Nubia Del Socorro

texts.es:
Nubia del Socorro de 60 años de edad es una microempresaria que se ha hecho a pulso, con sacrificio y dedicación a logrado montar su taller de confección a terceros en el cual labora de lunes a domingo de 8 de la mañana a 5 de la tarde, ofreciéndoles empleo a dos vecinas de su sector.
Su mayor sueño es poder ampliar su negocio y generar más fuentes de empleo porque está convencida que aparte de ofrecer un servicio ayuda a mejorar la condición económica de varias mujeres que lo necesitan.

En la actualidad se encuentra solicitando un crédito para la compra de una máquina recubridora con el fin de mejorar la calidad en el servicio y aumentar su producción.
texts.en:
Nubia del Socorro is 60 years old. She is a small business owner who has worked hard, and with sacrifice and dedication, has managed to assemble her workshop. She works Monday to Sunday from 8am to 5pm. She employs two of her neighbors.

Her biggest dream is to be able to expand her business and to generate more jobs, because she is convinced that this will help to improve the economic status of several women that need it.

She is currently requesting a loan to buy a sewing machine to improve the quality of service and to increase production.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine.

loans.name: Monina

texts.en:
Monina works hard to support her family. For the past five years she has run a business making rope.

Monina is applying for a 10,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy materials needed for her business such as nylon, fiber and other equipment. Her ambition is to build and expand her business.

loans.use: to buy nylon, fiber and other rope-making equipment.

loans.name: Monalisa

texts.en:
Monalisa, 37, is married and has five children. She is a hardworking entrepreneur who prepares and sells food in the Philippines.

Monalisa previously borrrowed and successfully paid off a loan of 15,000 PHP from NWTF. She is now is applying for a 16,000 PHP to buy more ingredients for her business. NWTF is listing Monalisa's business profile again in support of her efforts to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food business.

loans.name: Luna

texts.en:
As a married mother of three children, Luna works hard to support her family.

She makes crafts with shells in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from general store. Luna is borrowing 15000 PHP through NWTF to buy raw materials for her crafting.

Luna has been sustaining her business activities through her past 8 loans from NWTF and, more recently, through Kiva. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of building and expanding her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy raw materials to craft with shells.

loans.name: Marivic

texts.en:
Marivic is 32 years old and married with one kid. She works very hard to provide for her family.

Marivic runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 10000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase more goods like snack foods and soap to sell in her store.

She has been in this business for 2 years. 

In the future, Marivic would like to build and expand her business and repair her family home.

loans.use: to purchase more goods like snack foods and soap to sell in her store.

loans.name: Mario

texts.en:
This is Mario, 33, a resident of Silang, Cavite, Philippines. Single, he manages his household while operating a business. At this time, he is working hard to continually provide income for his everyday expenses and help his parents financially.

Mario operates a salon business. He offers hair styling, hair grooming and services of the like. He also offers hair straightening. His regular customers are his neighbors and the local community. His salon is located adjacent to his house. His regular customers are his neighbors and the local community. He earns a minimum of 500 PHP in sales every day.

To help him continue the operations of his business, he is requesting a 30,000 PHP loan that he will use to buy beauty products and hair products like shampoo, hair treatment creams and oils, and other things needed for his business. He expects a boost in his income as he expands his business. 

Mario hopes to renovate his parlor and dreams of having a good life. He faithfully meets up with his co-fellowship* members to share stories of his work every week and draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God he studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: to buy beauty products and hair products for his salon.

loans.name: Rosalie

texts.en: Rosalie, 37, is married and lives in Migcanaway, Tangub City. She has one child. She owns a sari-sari store as a source of income. She's been in business for 10 years already and earns 5,000 PHP a month from her sari-sari store. She joined GDMPC in 2010. Rosalie asked for a loan amount of 27,000.00 PHP, which she will use to invest in expanding her business. She plans to improve/expand her business with the profits she generates.

loans.use: to expand her business.

loans.name: Ma. Christine Mae

texts.en: This time, out of the past two years, Ma. Christine Mae is borrowing 14,000 Philippine pesos to purchase more groceries for her store. The food vending business that she previously funded through NWTF and partner Kiva continues to provide her and her family with income that is improving their quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase more stock to sell in her store.

loans.name: Edward

texts.en: Edward, age 32, is married and lives in Tukuran, Zamboanga Del Sur. His business is operating a tricycle as a source of his income. Edward has been engaged in this kind of business for five years. He earns 4,000 PHP a month. In 2010, he joined GDMPC. Edward asked for a loan of 15,000 PHP, which will be used for repairing his tricycle unit used in his business. He plans to purchase an additional tricycle unit to expand and improve his business.

loans.use: to repair his tricycle unit used in his business
